1a1(mdo sde): (aM) @#/ ! /mdo sde sna tshogs kyi skor bzhugs so/ /
1a2(mdo sde): (黃) 經藏第三十一部
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pUr+Na pra mu kha a ba dA na sha ti ka / bod skad du/ gang po la sogs
1b2(mdo sde): pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdom ni/
1b3(mdo sde): gang po bzang dang grags ldan ma/ /le lo can dang ded dpon rnams/ /zla ba che ba pad ma dang / /pany+tsa la dang
1b4(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / /rgyal po 'jug tu smos pa ste/ /'di ni sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /ljongs shig tu bram ze gang po
1b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams
1b6(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
1b7(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang /
1b8(mdo sde): mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas
2a1(mdo sde): te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
2a2(mdo sde): pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas gsar du byung ste/ gsung rab kyi snying khu 'thung ba'i dus la bab cing / lha dang mi man cad la
2a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
2a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon par 'jig rten thams cad du grags pas yongs su gang ngo / /de nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba
2a5(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la
2a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba dang / bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des re shig na rab tu byung ba thams cad la
2a7(mdo sde): mchod sbyin byas nas/ der mu stegs can la sogs pa stong phrag du mas zan zos so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pa btul nas/ de btul bas srog chags 'bum
2a8(mdo sde): phrag mang po dul bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i khab nas gang po'i nye du rnams lhags te/ gang po'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang pos bcom ldan
2b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi yon tan thos nas dga' ba chen po thob par gyur to/ /de nas khang thog tu song nas rgyal po'i khab logs su kha ltas te 'dug nas pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga sa la btsugs te/ me tog kyang gtor bdug pa dang chu yang phul
2b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod sbyin la gshegs su gsol/ mchod sbyin gyi mdun sa gzigs su gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas
2b3(mdo sde): kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog gi khang par gyur te 'dug go/ /bdug pa ni sprin gyi mgo lta bur gyur to/ /chu ni bai dUr+ya'i sdong bu lta bur gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
2b4(mdo sde): dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa spyan 'dren 'di ga las mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na/ bram ze che zhing
2b5(mdo sde): mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba 'dug pa der 'o bu cag 'dong dgos kyis dge slong dag chos shig / de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis zhabs 'bring byas nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo'i ljongs su rgyu zhing gshegs te/ bram ze che zhing
2b6(mdo sde): mtho ba gang po'i mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sa dang nye ba zhig du gshegs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas bram ze gang po rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de dag mi snang
2b7(mdo sde): bar mdzad de/ nyag cig lhung bzed dang chu snod phyag na bsnams nas/ gang po dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang pos bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
2b8(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang shin tu rings
3a1(mdo sde): par bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol/ bdag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bshos
3a2(mdo sde): gsol bar ci gnang zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'di'i nang du byin cig /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyas
3a3(mdo sde): g.yog byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs mkhur ba dang bshos dang 'jams dang bldag pa dang bzhib pa la sogs pas lhung bzed 'gengs par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
3a4(mdo sde): nyid kyi lhung bzed kyi nang nas dge slong stong gi lhung bzed dag gi nang du zas de dag 'pho bar mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong gi lhung bzed rnams gang bar thugs su chud pa de'i tshe nyid kyi lhung bzed
3a5(mdo sde): gang bar bstan to/ /de nas dge slong stong lhung bzed gang ba zla ba tshes pa'i dbyibs lta bur 'khod pa bstan to/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong stong gi lhung bzed rnams
3a6(mdo sde): gang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /de nas cho 'phrul bstan pa des bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po dga' bar gyur nas/ dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs shing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur te/ sdong po
3a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing
3a8(mdo sde): yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs
3b1(mdo sde): rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
3b2(mdo sde): 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni
3b3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang /
3b4(mdo sde): ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro
3b5(mdo sde): bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas
3b6(mdo sde): de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par kyang ma gyur la gzhan du na yang ma skyes mod kyi/
3b7(mdo sde): 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar
3b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu
4a1(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po
4a2(mdo sde): rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang /
4a3(mdo sde): mi gdung ba rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang
4a4(mdo sde): brjod par byed de nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par
4a5(mdo sde): byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'-i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi
4a6(mdo sde): phyi bzhin du 'brangs te gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su
4a7(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye
4a8(mdo sde): bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag
4b1(mdo sde): g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
4b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par gzhed na ni smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
4b3(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor tu mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur ro/ /
4b4(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /
4b5(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi bgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag ni dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen
4b6(mdo sde): ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pas som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung
4b7(mdo sde): mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum
4b8(mdo sde): pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
5a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo
5a2(mdo sde): bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
5a3(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par
5a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po bzang zhes bya bar gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing
5a5(mdo sde): mtho ba gang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ gang pos bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sar bshos gsol te/ lhag
5a6(mdo sde): par yang des dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag par skyed do/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o ri mor bya'o mchod par bya'o ston pa la bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas/
5a7(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
5a8(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / //grags ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
5b1(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang /
5b2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos
5b3(mdo sde): dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te
5b4(mdo sde): lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /yangs pa can du mthar gyis bsod snyoms la gshegs nas
5b5(mdo sde): dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la der gshegs te byon nas gang na gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas dmag dpon seng ge'i mna' ma grags ldan ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod pa des
5b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan dang dpe byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa mthong nas shin tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/ /des gyos po la dris pa bdag kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i thabs 'ga' lta mchis sam/
5b7(mdo sde): de nas dmag dpon seng ge 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste gal te 'di rkyen dang phrad na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras
5b8(mdo sde): pa/ bu mo gal te rgyu yang dag par blangs te 'dug na ni khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas dmag dpon seng ges grags ldan ma'i dad pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ dbyig dang gser dang rin po che mang du byin
6a1(mdo sde): no/ /de nas grags ldan mas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa phyi de nyin khyim gyi nang du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir gnang ngo / /de nas bu mo grags
6a2(mdo sde): ldan mas gser dang dngul dang rin po che'i me tog rnams kyang byed du bcug / spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa mang po dag kyang bsogs zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang bshams nas bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/
6a3(mdo sde): btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong
6a4(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa
6a5(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis gtor to/ /de nas me tog de dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs
6a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'i khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyal mtshan can mgar ba 'am mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de lta bur gyur
6a7(mdo sde): te 'dug go/ /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam
6a8(mdo sde): btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol
6b1(mdo sde): ba dang dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo grags ldan ma'i rgyu gcig
6b2(mdo sde): nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe de'i zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
6b3(mdo sde): ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang /
6b4(mdo sde): ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas
6b5(mdo sde): tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur
6b6(mdo sde): ro/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong
6b7(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du sems te kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse
6b8(mdo sde): zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der
7a1(mdo sde): nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang /
7a2(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge
7a3(mdo sde): rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song
7a4(mdo sde): nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /
7a5(mdo sde): 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /
7a6(mdo sde): zhes brjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las
7a7(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung
7a8(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi
7b1(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
7b2(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung
7b3(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par
7b4(mdo sde): bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang
7b5(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /
7b6(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba
7b7(mdo sde): dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /
7b8(mdo sde): thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brten pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da
8a1(mdo sde): 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /
8a2(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bu mo grags ldan ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i
8a3(mdo sde): bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo grags ldan ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum
8a4(mdo sde): gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
8a5(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur de 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang
8a6(mdo sde): nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
8a7(mdo sde): le lo can zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang /
8a8(mdo sde): lha rnams dang klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor
8b1(mdo sde): byas mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
8b2(mdo sde): na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi
8b3(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs zhing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig
8b4(mdo sde): gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang / bu med bu mo med nas de lag pa la
8b5(mdo sde): rkom tshugs bcas te/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam
8b6(mdo sde): ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang ltas mkhan dang mdza' bo dang gnyen dang rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/ /'jig rten na yang gsol ba
8b7(mdo sde): btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de ltar ni ma yin te gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
8b8(mdo sde): po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /
9a1(mdo sde): ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur na 'on kyang dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams dang ltas mkhan rnams dang mdza'
9a2(mdo sde): bo dang gnyen dang rtsa lag rnams kyis de la mtho brtsams nas/ de bud med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba
9a3(mdo sde): 'debs te/ 'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'-i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang
9a4(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/ /bud med
9a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de lnga gang zhe na skyes pa chags pa yang shes la ma chags pa yang shes pa dang / dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang bu chags pa shes pa
9a6(mdo sde): dang gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang / khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/ /gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su rten cing gnas so/ /
9a7(mdo sde): de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa jo bo bdag la sras chags te/ bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/
9a8(mdo sde): de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo bdag gi bu rung bar shog shig mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag
9b1(mdo sde): byed par shog shig gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig nor skal la spyod par shog shig bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/
9b2(mdo sde): de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /des bu chags par rig nas bu'i
9b3(mdo sde): rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang ha cang kha ba ma yin pa
9b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/ kha ba dang skyur ba dang
9b5(mdo sde): lan tshwa dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba med pa'i zas rnams sten cing / do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u
9b6(mdo sde): 'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig
9b7(mdo sde): btsas nas de btsas pa'i tshe khyim gang gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur te de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa
9b8(mdo sde): na khyim gang gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dga' byed ces gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming dga' byed ces btags so/ /de nas khye'u dga' byed pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
10a1(mdo sde): dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang
10a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes te lo lnga 'am drug lon pa de'i tshe/ le lo can
10a3(mdo sde): mchog tu le lo che ba zhig du gyur te mal dang stan las kyang ldang mi 'dod do/ /de blo rno zhing gsal bas khyim gyi nang du 'dug bzhin du bstan bcos rnams bslabs so/ /de nas tshong dpon de 'di snyam du sems te
10a4(mdo sde): bdag gis lha mnyes par byas na/ brgya lam na lan gcig na bu skyes pa de yang le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig du gyur te mal dang stan las kyang mi ldang na 'di ltar lus tha mal par gyur kyang
10a5(mdo sde): grum po bzhin du lnga re 'dug pa 'di 'dra ba'i bu lta ci dgos snyam mo/ /tshong dpon de yang rdzogs byed la dga' ste/ des mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug rang gi khyim du bos nas/ gal te khye'u 'dis
10a6(mdo sde): de dag mthong na rjes bskyed de mal nas ldang ba tsam yang byed srid dam snyam pa dang / de nas khye'u le lo can gyis ston pa de dag mthong nas mig gis kyang ma bltas na/ ldang ba 'am gus par smra ba 'am
10a7(mdo sde): stan bstabs pa lta ci smos/ de nas tshong dpon des gnas skabs de lta bu mthong nas ches rab tu gdung bar gyur te lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ /de'i skabs su sangs
10a8(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs
10b1(mdo sde): pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/
10b2(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dres par byas pa mi 'jigs pa
10b3(mdo sde): bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol
10b4(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
10b5(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis
10b6(mdo sde): n yin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod
10b7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/
10b8(mdo sde): su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa rnams las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
11a1(mdo sde): bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /
11a2(mdo sde): dus las yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyis nga mthong na brtson 'grus rtsom par
11a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du sems yongs su 'gyur bar 'ong ngo snyam du gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa dang dregs
11a4(mdo sde): pa gcad pa dang khye'u yi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms
11a5(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur nas/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus rab tu sim par byas snyam ste/ des phan tshun du bltas so/ /
11a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te khyim de'i nang du gshegs nas khye'u le lo can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
11a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba la bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong
11a8(mdo sde): nas kyang mchog tu dga' bar gyur te 'phral la rang nyid langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs so/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
11b1(mdo sde): gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad kyang smras so/ /de nas de'i pha ma dang nang mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i gus par sgrim pa mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas khye'u
11b2(mdo sde): le lo can gyis dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la le lo'i nyes pa dang brtson
11b3(mdo sde): 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon rnam pa du ma bka' stsal nas/ tsan dan gyi dbyug gu zhig kyang de la byin te khye'u dbyug gu 'di rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas des dbyug gu de brdungs pa dang / sgra snyan pa thos
11b4(mdo sde): par gyur la rin po che'i gter sna tshogs kyang mthong ngo / /de nas de 'di snyam du sems de/ kye ma brtson 'grus rtsom pa la ni khyad par chen po de lta bu yod kyis/ bdag gis phyir zhing brtson 'grus brtsam par bya gor
11b5(mdo sde): ma chag snyam nas des mnyan du yod par dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ bdag nyid kyis ded dpon bya bar bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po la lan drug rgal te gru'i don grub pas rin po che chen po bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das
11b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyi rgyu gcig nas
11b7(mdo sde): gcig tu brgyud pa dang las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od
11b8(mdo sde): zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu
12a1(mdo sde): 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar
12a2(mdo sde): gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can
12a3(mdo sde): de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnam rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir
12a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te kye bdag cag 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung
12a5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar
12a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang
12a7(mdo sde): s um bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen
12a8(mdo sde): p o rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams
12b1(mdo sde): dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
12b2(mdo sde): kyang rjod par byed de/ /nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /
12b3(mdo sde): bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor
12b4(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las
12b5(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni
12b6(mdo sde): zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
12b7(mdo sde): stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang
12b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed
13a1(mdo sde): na ni smin 'tshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag
13a2(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
13a3(mdo sde): tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de'i phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol
13a4(mdo sde): pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi bgyes spang pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis pas/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum
13a5(mdo sde): mi ston/ /brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the
13a6(mdo sde): tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni
13a7(mdo sde): khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
13a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'di dge ba'i
13b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos
13b2(mdo sde): p a'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs dang
13b3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang mthu rtsal dang shin tu ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
13b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ ded dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
13b5(mdo sde): r gyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin
13b6(mdo sde): rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci
13b7(mdo sde): dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa
13b8(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon chen po zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i
14a1(mdo sde): nang du gru bub ste/ phyir 'ongs nas des lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du lha thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs na 'on kyang gru bub ste phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas de mi
14a2(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po skyes nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis thabs gang gis nor bsdu bar bya ba'i thabs ci yod snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni lha thams cad las kyang
14a3(mdo sde): ches khyad par du 'phags te/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ thugs rje can bdag nyid chen po chos la gus pa/ skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa yin gyis/ da ni bdag gis 'di la brten te yang
14a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la gru'i don legs par grub ste phyir 'ongs na nor phyed kyis 'di la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/ /des de ltar brtson 'grus byas te/ yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
14a5(mdo sde): rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/ rin po che chen po bsdus te bde ba dang nye zho med par bdag gi khyim du phyin to/ /de ngal bso nas snod bzlugs na/ des rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas chags pa chen po skyes te/
14a6(mdo sde): bdag gis rin po che 'di lta bu dag dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyed ji ltar sbyin snyam du sems pa la zhugs te ma la bdag gis 'di rnams bdag gi chung ma'i lag tu zho'i bzhi cha cig tu btsongs la/ bcom ldan 'das la
14a7(mdo sde): spos dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /des zho'-i bzhi cha gcig gis a ga ru'i spos nyos nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de nas shin tu ngo tsha ba bzhin du sgo gang du 'dug nas a ga rus bdugs so/ /
14a8(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis bdug pa de steng gi nam mkha' la yang dag par 'phags te mnyan du yod pa thams cad khyab par gyur nas sprin chen po'-i mgo ltar 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
14b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba mdzad do/ /des lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ bdag gi sems la brgyad bkag nas/ gang bdag gis rin po che'i sgo nas/
14b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bslu ba 'di ni bdag gi cha ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas ded dpon des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de nas zhal zas bzang pos
14b3(mdo sde): tshim par byas nas rin po che chen po dag gis gtor to/ /de nas rin po che de dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam
14b4(mdo sde): mkha' la 'phags nas/ rin po che'i khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyal mtshan can mgar ba 'am mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de lta bur gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas ded dpon
14b5(mdo sde): des cho 'phrul de mthong nas ched kyis dga' ba skyes te/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa
14b6(mdo sde): dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma sgral ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin
14b7(mdo sde): pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu
14b8(mdo sde): brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang
15a1(mdo sde): dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod
15a2(mdo sde): d ang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song
15a3(mdo sde): nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
15a4(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de de dag gis
15a5(mdo sde): sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad
15a6(mdo sde): par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden
15a7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba de der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang
15a8(mdo sde): dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang tshad med 'od
15b1(mdo sde): r nams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong
15b2(mdo sde): rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed do nges par 'byung ba brtsam
15b3(mdo sde): par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /
15b4(mdo sde): skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das
15b5(mdo sde): nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni
15b6(mdo sde): mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang
15b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i
15b8(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston
16a1(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod
16a2(mdo sde): spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
16a3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po
16a4(mdo sde): zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyags rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /
16a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /
16a6(mdo sde): dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /
16a7(mdo sde): mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan pa 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
16a8(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo ded
16b1(mdo sde): dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo ded dpon 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtang ba 'dis bskal
16b2(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang
16b3(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
16b4(mdo sde): de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
16b5(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do/ / //zla ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams
16b6(mdo sde): dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang /
16b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas
16b8(mdo sde): dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
17a1(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de nas mnyan du yod pa na tha ga pa zla ba zhes bya ba dbul zhing mchog tu dbul ba zhig gnas so/ /de yang las ji tsam zhig byed pa de tsam nyi tshe'i zan rnyed par zad do des cung
17a2(mdo sde): zad kyang bzhag tu med do/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bsod nams ma byas par 'dir 'ongs la/ 'dir yang dge ba mi byed pas 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu yang bsod
17a3(mdo sde): nams kyang ma byas dge ba yang ma byas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mgon skyabs kyang ma byas par 'gro dgos srid kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la sna 'ga' zhig gis mchod pa bya gor ma chag snyam mo de nas
17a4(mdo sde): des khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi ras btags nas/ des de las ras kyi tshar tshar khyer te srang du zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du
17a5(mdo sde): yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
17a6(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur to/ /
17a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyid kyi chos gos ral bar bstan to/ /de nas des ras kyi tshar tshar de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i mod la chos
17a8(mdo sde): gos drubs par bstan to/ /de nas de rgya cher dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa chung la zhing ni rgya che ste/ /mthu chen khyod nyid thugs su chud
17b1(mdo sde): par bas/ /sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/ /bdag ni rgya cher grags pa'i sangs rgyas shog /sbyin pa 'di ni chung ngu lags kyis kyang / /bdag gi sems ni rab yangs dpag yas te/ /mi dang lha
17b2(mdo sde): mchog rgyal bas bzhes nas ni/ /sbyin pa chung yang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni phyi mar zhi ba mthu che ba/ /rgya chen grags pa mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /
17b3(mdo sde): rang byung 'jig rten phan pa snying brtser ldan/ /tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tha ga zla ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig du brgyud
17b4(mdo sde): pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag byung nas/
17b5(mdo sde): kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus gzhom dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang
17b6(mdo sde): r ab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems
17b7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse
17b8(mdo sde): zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do/ /
18a1(mdo sde): de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i
18a2(mdo sde): mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha
18a3(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams
18a4(mdo sde): d ang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang
18a5(mdo sde): t shad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams
18a6(mdo sde): dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang
18a7(mdo sde): rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di
18a8(mdo sde): nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
18b1(mdo sde): gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
18b2(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar
18b3(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis
18b4(mdo sde): su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni
18b5(mdo sde): phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
18b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi
18b7(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te
18b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal kyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /
19a1(mdo sde): yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag ni dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /
19a2(mdo sde): pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog
19a3(mdo sde): brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa gsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo
19a4(mdo sde): mdzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
19a5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong
19a6(mdo sde): lags so/ /kun dga' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i
19a7(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang snying
19a8(mdo sde): rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /
19b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //che ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
19b2(mdo sde): po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/
19b3(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sby-in dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye
19b4(mdo sde): c hen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
19b5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon gyi bu che ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas so/ /de yang khro
19b6(mdo sde): ba'i kun nas bkris pa shas che ba zhig ste/ rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug la mchod pa byed do/ /de phyis nad tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te de sman pa dang sman dang nad g.yog med de shi la thug nas 'di
19b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i skyabs byed pa 'am srog phangs pa sbyin par byed pa sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de nas de ltar bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das
19b8(mdo sde): la gsol ba 'debs so/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
20a1(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/
20a2(mdo sde): rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/
20a3(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba
20a4(mdo sde): lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/
20a5(mdo sde): lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed
20a6(mdo sde): pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga
20a7(mdo sde): bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung te/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la
20a8(mdo sde): gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i
20b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /
20b2(mdo sde): 'dir smras pa rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong
20b3(mdo sde): dpon gyi bu che ba'i gnas skabs de gzigs nas/ 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong du yongs su
20b4(mdo sde): bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgo gang du gshegs nas sgo srungs kyi mis bcom
20b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so zhes de la sbran no/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu che ba dga' bar gyur te/ dbugs mi phyin pa dbugs phyin par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/ /
20b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /
20b7(mdo sde): bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba la bka' stsal pa/ che ba khyod la gnod pa ci zhig yod/ che bas gsol pa/ bdag la lus kyi gnod pa dang / sems kyi gnod pa mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
20b8(mdo sde): kyis de la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gdam ngag bstan te/ 'di ni khyod kyi sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ kye ma lha'i dbang
21a1(mdo sde): po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sman gshi ri ka khyer te 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos
21a2(mdo sde): ngad ldang las sman gshi ri ka blangs te bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi phyag du bzhes nas che ba la byin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal tsha ba zhi bar byed pa yin no
21a3(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas des lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to sems dga' bar gyur nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la bsnyad de bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
21a4(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol nas/ 'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul te/ me tog dang spos dang me tog phreng thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /de nas sems la rtas par byas te smon lam btab pa/
21a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal pos bdag gsos pa bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
21a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su
21a7(mdo sde): mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas
21a8(mdo sde): gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang
21b1(mdo sde): dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba
21b2(mdo sde): rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems
21b3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams
21b4(mdo sde): rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa
21b5(mdo sde): 'gyed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba
21b6(mdo sde): 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las
21b7(mdo sde): de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum
21b8(mdo sde): b cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen
22a1(mdo sde): po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras
22a2(mdo sde): bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs
22a3(mdo sde): so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung bar brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom
22a4(mdo sde): par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de
22a5(mdo sde): dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni
22a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
22a7(mdo sde): na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor
22a8(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi
22b1(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos
22b2(mdo sde): kyi byang chub du lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang
22b4(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams
22b5(mdo sde): kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur
22b6(mdo sde): gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi
22b7(mdo sde): 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin
22b8(mdo sde): da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo
23a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par mdzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti
23a2(mdo sde): byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum
23a3(mdo sde): gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa
23a4(mdo sde): bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par
23a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
23a6(mdo sde): pad ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha
23a7(mdo sde): rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ l
23a8(mdo sde): ha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas
23b1(mdo sde): dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
23b2(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i snga rol na ni/ rgyal po gsal rgyal lha gzhan dag la ni dus gsum du me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa rnams
23b3(mdo sde): kyis brjed par byed do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas ni/ gzhon nu lta bu'i mdo'-i dpes rgyal po gsal rgyal btul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ de'i tshe
23b4(mdo sde): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro zhing / mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed do/ /de nas re shig na kun
23b5(mdo sde): dga' ra ba'i srungs ma zhig gis me tog pad ma gser du byung ba zhig khyer te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du mnyan du yod par song ba dang / mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen zhig gis mthong nas/
