68b5(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang
68b6(mdo sde): zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de'i tshe gang gA'i
68b7(mdo sde): klung gis 'gram nas thag mi ring ba zhig nas mchod rten zhig ral du gyur pa rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchod rten 'di
68b8(mdo sde): su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas tsan dan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de'i yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga las
69a1(mdo sde): byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga las byung ba dang / ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod
69a2(mdo sde): dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
69a3(mdo sde): grong khyer bA ra Na si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang
69a4(mdo sde): 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan pa 'dug go/ /rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de bu med
69a5(mdo sde): nas bu 'dod te gu lang dang chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te 'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i
69a6(mdo sde): lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos mthun pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang
69a7(mdo sde): bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la
69a8(mdo sde): yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing
69b1(mdo sde): zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la des skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang
69b2(mdo sde): pad ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig skyes te/ de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la kha ni mi 'byed pa zhig yod do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang pad ma de legs par
69b3(mdo sde): srungs shig ces bsgo'o/ /phyis re shig na nyi ma 'char khar pad ma de kha bye nas pad ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/
69b4(mdo sde): lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes
69b5(mdo sde): par byas pa zhig skyil mo dkrung bcas shing 'dug ste/ de'i kha nas ni pad ma'i dri 'byung la/ lus las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas
69b6(mdo sde): rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong nas/ khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/ yab tshur gshegs bdag ni khyod sras mi mnga' ba'i sras lags so/ /de nas
69b7(mdo sde): rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs nas smras pa/ bu de ni khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas/ pad ma'i snying po las khye'u blangs te lag par bzhag go/ /de nas khye'u des gang
69b8(mdo sde): dang gang du rkang pa bzhag pa de dang der pad ma dag byung ngo / /de nas de'i ming tsan dan zhes btags so/ /gang gi tshe khye'u tsan dan khad kyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag
69c1(mdo sde): cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na lha sras tsan dan btang ba'i rigs so/ /'on kyang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la gnas thams cad kyang pad mas brgyan par 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal pos
69c2(mdo sde): smras pa de ltar bya'o/ /de nas tsan dan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ blon po'i bu rnams kyis g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing grong khyer gyi dus ston mang bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i pho
69c3(mdo sde): brang nas phyi rol du phyung ngo / /de nas de der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad ma lta na sdug cing yid 'phrog pa dag byung ste/ de dag la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog ma thag tu rnyings shing skams so/ /de nas sems can dag pa bsam
69c4(mdo sde): pa dge ba sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed skyed pa des de mthong nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa skyes te/ ji ltar pad ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes par 'dug la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pas ni/ rnyings shing rkam
69c5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di yang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo/ /de de ltar sems shing 'jal la nye bar rtog pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ des skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang na/
69c6(mdo sde): 'dug bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas re shig na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te de dag bgos nas/ nam mkha' la 'phags te cho 'phrul
69c7(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ de mthong bas rgyal po dang blon po dang grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
69c8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ni de las byung ste/ ming yang de las btags so/ /dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas
69d1(mdo sde): tsan dan gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na/ des de'i lus kyang dri bda' la dbang po lnga yang rno bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/
69d2(mdo sde): des der dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la spos chu'i dbang bskur ba yang phul me tog dag kyang btags te/ der rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang bsgoms so/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
69d3(mdo sde): ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mo bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
69d4(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pad ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
69d5(mdo sde): l dan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams
69d6(mdo sde): dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
69d7(mdo sde): r nams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
69d8(mdo sde): bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ kun dga' ra ba'i srangs
70a1(mdo sde): ma rnams kyis pad ma dag blangs te srang du song zhing 'tshong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs
70a2(mdo sde): so/ /bud med cig kyang khye'u zhig pang na thogs te srang du song ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad
70a3(mdo sde): bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te blo thor du lag
70a4(mdo sde): pa brkyang nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma las pad ma blangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bor ro/ /de nas pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la bzhes na ni sdod do/
70a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag bkye nas/ des mnyan du yod par ril gyis snang bar byas so/ /rgyu des na rgyal po dang blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad par byas so/ /
70a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams
70a7(mdo sde): byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang
70a8(mdo sde): rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i
70b1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil
70b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/
70b3(mdo sde): de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag
70b4(mdo sde): cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du
70b5(mdo sde): gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang
70b6(mdo sde): dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang /
70b7(mdo sde): 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams
70b8(mdo sde): dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra
71a1(mdo sde): sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung bar brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag
71a2(mdo sde): sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer
71a3(mdo sde): d e dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan
71a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi
71a5(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston
71a6(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung
71a7(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
71a8(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
71b1(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna
71b2(mdo sde): stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral
71b3(mdo sde): zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis
71b4(mdo sde): dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur
71b5(mdo sde): brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
71b6(mdo sde): dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas de bzhin gshegs
71b7(mdo sde): pa la pad ma bor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa bcwa lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar
71b8(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rang sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar
72a1(mdo sde): bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag
72a2(mdo sde): yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang
72a3(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/
72a4(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
72a5(mdo sde): pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan d+ha ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /
72a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/ de'i chung ma lang tsho la bab pa de/ khyim thab la gdung zhing yongs su yi chad la smre sngags 'don kyang de'i khyim thab ma 'ongs nas/ des sred
72a7(mdo sde): med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te dam bcas pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim thab myur du 'ongs na bdag gis khyod la gser gyi 'khor lo dbul lo zhes byas so/ /de nas de'i khyim thab rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas myur du phyir
72a8(mdo sde): 'khor te nye zho med par bde bar 'ongs so/ /de nas des gser gyi 'khor lo byed du bcug ste/ de bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor bas 'khor lo dang spos dang bdug pa dang me tog khyer te lha khang du chas so/ /
72b1(mdo sde): de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen 'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig
72b2(mdo sde): rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar
72b3(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i
72b4(mdo sde): dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba
72b5(mdo sde): lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me
72b6(mdo sde): tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu
72b7(mdo sde): pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni
72b8(mdo sde): phongs shing 'dug / su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/
73a1(mdo sde): su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi
73a2(mdo sde): dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par
73a3(mdo sde): grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus
73a4(mdo sde): las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo des nga mthong na rang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro snyam du gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol
73a5(mdo sde): te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom
73a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i
73a7(mdo sde): 'od mnga' ba/ /rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /de nas mthong ba'i mod la dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dor bar byas so/ /de nas bran mos
73a8(mdo sde): bkag ste 'di sred med kyi bu ma yin zhes byas so/ /'on kyang de bkag bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gser gyi 'khor lo bor ro/ /spos
73b1(mdo sde): dang bdug pa dang me tog kyang phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon
73b2(mdo sde): po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms
73b3(mdo sde): dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/
73b4(mdo sde): /tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /
73b5(mdo sde): de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa
73b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on
73b7(mdo sde): kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems
73b8(mdo sde): can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag
74a1(mdo sde): n i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na
74a2(mdo sde): ' don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes
74a3(mdo sde): rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung ba rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag
74a4(mdo sde): med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed do/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag
74a5(mdo sde): sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer
74a6(mdo sde): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan
74a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi
74a8(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
74b1(mdo sde): mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur
74b2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi
74b3(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug
74b4(mdo sde): tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
74b5(mdo sde): bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar
74b6(mdo sde): bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyu gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma
74b7(mdo sde): mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni
74b8(mdo sde): gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi
75a1(mdo sde): don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
75a2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/
75a3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa bcwa lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rang sangs rgyas 'khor
75a4(mdo sde): lo bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge
75a5(mdo sde): slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod to// //mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/
75a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin
75a7(mdo sde): rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams
75a8(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/
75b1(mdo sde): yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas mchod rten rnying pa rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas
75b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
75b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa gang las byung ba dang ming ci las btags pa
75b4(mdo sde): nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
75b5(mdo sde): dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug
75b6(mdo sde): pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug go/ /rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig ste chos bzhin du rgyal po byed
75b7(mdo sde): do/ /de nas rgyal po de/ bu med nas bu 'dod de gu lang dang chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i
75b8(mdo sde): lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos 'thun dang pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig
76a1(mdo sde): rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni 'khor los
76a2(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar gyur te gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus
76a3(mdo sde): la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po ud pa la dang
76a4(mdo sde): pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar pos gang ba/ 'gram ngang pa dang ngur pa dang zal mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig blo rtol du skyes te/
76a5(mdo sde): de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang pad ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o/ /phyis re shig
76a6(mdo sde): na nyi ma 'char kar pad ma de kha bye nas pad ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes
76a7(mdo sde): che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo dkrung
76a8(mdo sde): bcas shing 'dug ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos thos nas blon po dang btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong ste/ pad ma'i snying po la de lta bur mdzes
76b1(mdo sde): shing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas khye'u de blangs te bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas rang gi pho brang du
76b2(mdo sde): khyer nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas ston rgyas par byas nas mgo bcu pa zhes ming btags so/ /de nas khye'u mgo bcu pa pang na 'tsho
76b3(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang
76b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /khye'u de yang dad pa dang ldan la bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la
76b5(mdo sde): phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste des yab rgyal sa na 'dug na/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dag byed pa
76b6(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas yab la gsol pa/ yab bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/ /yab kyis kyang gnang
76b7(mdo sde): ste de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos tshon can bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de nas des lung mnos pa med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa
76b8(mdo sde): bdun mngon du gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas/ nam mkha' la 'phags te yab la cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan
77a1(mdo sde): drangs so/ /de nas de lus thogs pas yongs su skyo nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song ste de'i mchod rten 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong rnams
77a2(mdo sde): the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang dag bgyis na ma'i mngal du ma skyes te/ pad ma las skyes lags/
77a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag
77a4(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pas na/ mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur de/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
77a5(mdo sde): par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched
77a6(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong
77a7(mdo sde): dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
77a8(mdo sde): mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
77b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams
77b2(mdo sde): nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /ded dpon zhig kyang pad ma khyer te srang du zhugs so/ /de nas
77b3(mdo sde): des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan
77b4(mdo sde): pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu pad ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du bor te/ bor ma thag tu pad ma de bcom ldan
77b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la bzhes na ni sdod do/ /de nas re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis ded dpon de rang byang chub tu
77b6(mdo sde): lung bstan to/ /de nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang / de'i skabs su de'i chung ma bu btsa' zhing 'dug ste skad ngan 'don nas/ des bran mo la de ci zhig ces dris so/ /
77b7(mdo sde): des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do/ /de nas ded dpon de mi dga' bar gyur nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag nam yang 'khor ba na ma'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
77b8(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du nam yang
78a1(mdo sde): ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/ srid pa tha ma la yang de'i 'byor pa de 'dra bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la
78a2(mdo sde): bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
78a3(mdo sde): mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang
78a4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha
78a5(mdo sde): m a yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams gyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun
78a6(mdo sde): gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa
78a7(mdo sde): na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba nor dang yo byad mang ba bdag dbang ba mang ba/ mdza' bo dang blon po dang nye du dang rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan la
78a8(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di
78b1(mdo sde): dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can smig rgyu dang 'dra ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug
78b2(mdo sde): pa yin gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya ba gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas des bcom
78b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol ba dang gdugs tshod gsol bar spyan drangs so/ /de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dge slong gi
78b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la gshegs so/ /de nas tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyer te bsro khang du song nas bdag nyid kyis
78b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe khyim bdag des
78b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang
78b7(mdo sde): ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos
78b8(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par
79a1(mdo sde): dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du ma yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par bzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /
79a2(mdo sde): de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te sems la rtas par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di
79a3(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du
79a4(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol
79a5(mdo sde): dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pa la ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te
79a6(mdo sde): 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam
79a7(mdo sde): du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong
79a8(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
79b1(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar
79b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul
79b3(mdo sde): dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal
79b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom
79b5(mdo sde): snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges
79b6(mdo sde): par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod
79b7(mdo sde): par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/
79b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i
80a1(mdo sde): las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston
80a2(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis
80a3(mdo sde): su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na
80a4(mdo sde): ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur
80a5(mdo sde): ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du
80a6(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
80a7(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis
80a8(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /
80b1(mdo sde): pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gis ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /
80b2(mdo sde): bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /
80b3(mdo sde): de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
80b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di dge
80b5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur
80b6(mdo sde): pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
80b7(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ 'od
80b8(mdo sde): bsil zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu
81a1(mdo sde): rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang
81a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang
81a3(mdo sde): snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim
81a4(mdo sde): bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang
81a5(mdo sde): ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan dag la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin
81a6(mdo sde): can/ glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/ mi rtag pa mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis bdag gis longs
81a7(mdo sde): spyod snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ khyim yang rdo dang
81a8(mdo sde): gseg ma dang gyo mo med par byas te/ tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/ spos sna tshogs kyi snod ni bkram/ dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni gdugs/ me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor me tog gi gdan rnams ni
81b1(mdo sde): bshams so/ /de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang khur ba dang bshos rnams kyang sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod la bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab te bshos gsol
81b2(mdo sde): lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis
81b3(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag
81b4(mdo sde): des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ /rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/
81b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom
81b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam
81b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim
81b8(mdo sde): bdag de dad pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te sems dad par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang
82a1(mdo sde): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro
82a2(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang
82a3(mdo sde): kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pa la ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i
82a4(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos
82a5(mdo sde): sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos
82a6(mdo sde): par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems
82a7(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng
82a8(mdo sde): du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams
82b1(mdo sde): dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams
82b2(mdo sde): skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa
82b3(mdo sde): dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung bar brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi
82b4(mdo sde): bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer
82b5(mdo sde): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
82b6(mdo sde): snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar
82b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston
82b8(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
83a1(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed
83a2(mdo sde): na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni
83a3(mdo sde): dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
83a4(mdo sde): kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar
83a5(mdo sde): bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams
83a6(mdo sde): ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa so nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu
83a7(mdo sde): mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /
83a8(mdo sde): gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo
83b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa
83b2(mdo sde): mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas 'od bsil zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos
83b3(mdo sde): ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par
83b4(mdo sde): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
83b5(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang
83b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto
83b7(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
83b8(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong
84a1(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan pa rnams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig /mnyan pa rnams
84a2(mdo sde): kyis gsol pa/ gru btsas stsol cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du lhung ba
84a3(mdo sde): las bsgral/ sor phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/ bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa ni nga rgyal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/ steng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las
84a4(mdo sde): bsgral te 'on kyang ngas gru btsas ma blangs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal kyang bsgral bar khas ma blangs so/ /de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos/
84a5(mdo sde): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de yang mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas dge slong rnams grur zhugs pa dang
84a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan pa de bas kyang ches sngar pha rol gyi 'gram du bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas mnyan pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas sems dga' bar gyur te zhabs la mgo
84a7(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ mnyan pa des de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
84a8(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i
84b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas
84b2(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram
84b3(mdo sde): ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris
84b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha
84b5(mdo sde): rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang shi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba las/ /thub pa
84b6(mdo sde): khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de'i nang nas mnyan pa gcig cig 'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags nas/ bcom ldan
84b7(mdo sde): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos
84b8(mdo sde): nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems
85a1(mdo sde): c an dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a
85a2(mdo sde): chu zer dang ud pa la ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro
85a3(mdo sde): bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes
85a4(mdo sde): sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma
85a5(mdo sde): gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la
85a6(mdo sde): s ems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par
85a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang /
85a8(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams
85b1(mdo sde): dang / 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang
85b2(mdo sde): shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung
85b3(mdo sde): ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod
85b4(mdo sde): par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom
85b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed
85b6(mdo sde): na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par
85b7(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs
85b8(mdo sde): kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang
86a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
86a2(mdo sde): chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
86a3(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/
86a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis
86a5(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis
86a6(mdo sde): par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni
86a7(mdo sde): gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi
86a8(mdo sde): don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa
86b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis nga la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun
86b2(mdo sde): dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba rgal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i
86b3(mdo sde): chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab
86b4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/
86b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin
86b6(mdo sde): rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin
86b7(mdo sde): dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun
86b8(mdo sde): gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod
87a1(mdo sde): pa'i yul mi rnams kyis lugs kyis na phal cher byug pa sna tshogs kyi lus skud par byed do/ /de nas re shig na khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i
87a2(mdo sde): bran mo dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i tsan dan dmar po bdar zhing 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs
87a3(mdo sde): kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
87a4(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
87a5(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bu mo de dad pa chen po skyes so/ /de nas de dad pa rnyed nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byed mi
87a6(mdo sde): nus na bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo/ /de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas te/ lag pa gnyis ka tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bskus so/ /bcom ldan
87a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan dan gyi dris gang bar mdzad do/ /de nas bu mo des cho 'phrul de mthong nas sems dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
87a8(mdo sde): 'tshal nas sems la rtas par byas te/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas
87b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung
87b2(mdo sde): nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba
87b3(mdo sde): d ang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pa la ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de
87b4(mdo sde): dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtsa zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas
87b5(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis
87b6(mdo sde): sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/
87b7(mdo sde): bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/
87b8(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa
88a1(mdo sde): rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs
88a2(mdo sde): pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang
88a3(mdo sde): 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi bdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i
88a4(mdo sde): sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni
88a5(mdo sde): gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer
88a6(mdo sde): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni
88a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi snams logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
88a8(mdo sde): ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang
88b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor
88b2(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal
88b3(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug
88b4(mdo sde): tor tu mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
88b5(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis
88b6(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis
88b7(mdo sde): par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brten pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung
88b8(mdo sde): mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa'
89a1(mdo sde): bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
89a2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /
89a3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni
89a4(mdo sde): gang nga la sems dang bar byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
89a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
89a6(mdo sde): l dan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor kyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin
89a7(mdo sde): rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang nam
89a8(mdo sde): m kha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman
89b1(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na kun dga' ra
89b2(mdo sde): ba'i srungs ma zhig yod de/ des so shing zhig khyer te mnyan du yod par song ngo / /ltas mkhan zhig kyang so ka na 'dug ste/ de na re so shing 'di su za ba de ni zas ro brgya dang ldan pa za bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /
89b3(mdo sde): de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas tshig de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ so shing 'di gang la byin na de'i rgyus bdag cher bkur bar 'gyur zhig go snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom
89b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten na bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gro ba 'bras bu yod pa yin gyis/ bdag gis 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam mo/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i
89b5(mdo sde): srungs ma des so shing de khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
89b6(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du tshems shing 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas
89b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas bzhes so/ /bzhes nas kyang de kun dga' ra ba'i
89b8(mdo sde): srungs ma'i mdun du gsol to/ /gsol nas kyang so shing de sa la btsugs so/ /de nas btsugs pa'i mod de kho na'i skad cig la yal ga dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i shing n+ya gro d+hA
90a1(mdo sde): chen po chu zheng gab pa zhig tu gyur te/ de'i grib ma la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas lha dang mi du ma la chos bstan to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi zhal zas ro brgya
90a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gsol to/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul gyis sems dad par byas nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i
