90a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'dis bdag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/
90a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig
90a5(mdo sde): n ag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad
90a6(mdo sde): ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro
90a7(mdo sde): bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes
90a8(mdo sde): sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la
90b1(mdo sde): gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas
90b2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni rgyal
90b3(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don
90b4(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams
90b5(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i
90b6(mdo sde): sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde
90b7(mdo sde): ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /
90b8(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na
91a1(mdo sde): ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni
91a2(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
91a3(mdo sde): mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los
91a4(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni
91a5(mdo sde): zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par
91a6(mdo sde): bzhed na ni dbu'i tsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /
91a7(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams
91a8(mdo sde): kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i
91b1(mdo sde): rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal
91b2(mdo sde): ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum
91b3(mdo sde): mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo
91b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa
91b5(mdo sde): mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi
91b6(mdo sde): bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma dang lus tha ma dang bdag gi ngo bo tha ma la thob pa ni rang sangs rgyas dri ma med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems
91b7(mdo sde): dad par byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
91b8(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
92a1(mdo sde): gdangs snyan ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams
92a2(mdo sde): dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod
92a3(mdo sde): sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang
92a4(mdo sde): gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom
92a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /mdza' sde bo mang po zhig kyang chang gis ra ro zhing myos nas pi bang dang gling bu dang rdza rnga
92a6(mdo sde): dang rnga zlum rnams dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar byed glu len la me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang par shi ka la sogs pa me tog gi phreng ba mang po yang mgul du btags
92a7(mdo sde): nas/ gos khyad par du 'phags pa dag bgos te mnyan du yod pa'i phyi rol tu byung ngo / /de nas mdza' sde bo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan
92a8(mdo sde): pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong
92b1(mdo sde): ma thag tu de dag chang gis ra ro ba de las sangs par gyur to/ /de nas ra ro ba las sangs nas sems dga' zhing dad par gyur te/ gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /
92b2(mdo sde): ud pa la sngon po rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gtor te/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du khang pa brtsegs pa sngon po dang khang pa sngon po dang gdugs sngon po lta bur gyur te 'dug nas/ de dag bcom ldan
92b3(mdo sde): 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la gzhes na ni sdod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'od sngon po dag bkye ste/ 'od de dag gis mnyan du yod pa nor bu an da rnyil gyi mdog 'dra bar 'dug par byas so/ /de nas mdza' sde bo de
92b4(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te sems la rtas par byas nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'dis bdag cag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas
92b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po
92b6(mdo sde): rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang
92b7(mdo sde): t sha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal
92b8(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse
93a1(mdo sde): zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed
93a2(mdo sde): par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus
93a3(mdo sde): bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang
93a4(mdo sde): du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang /
93a5(mdo sde): dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang /
93a6(mdo sde): tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams
93a7(mdo sde): dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang / bdag med
93a8(mdo sde): pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi
93b1(mdo sde): bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal bsal bar byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas
93b2(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni
93b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs
93b4(mdo sde): kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
93b5(mdo sde): mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los
93b6(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni
93b7(mdo sde): zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
93b8(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom
94a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /
94a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad ma'i rtsa dang
94a3(mdo sde): dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /
94a4(mdo sde): bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /
94a5(mdo sde): de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
94a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo mdza' sde bo 'di rnams kyis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo mdza'
94a7(mdo sde): sde bo 'di rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shu'i bar du log par mi 'gyur te/ srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma dang lus tha ma dang bdag gi
94a8(mdo sde): ngo bo tha ma thob pa na/ rang sangs rgyas gdangs snyan zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dang bar byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab
94b1(mdo sde): par byas ste/ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te
94b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa rdzogs so// // gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa
94b3(mdo sde): brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ sdom ni/ pad ma dang ni kham re dang / /chos skyong de bzhin zhi ldan dang / /gzugs bzang mdza' bo'i bu mo dang / /ri bong dang ni chos tshol dang / /mgon med zas sbyin rab bzang ba/ /
94b4(mdo sde): sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/ /pad ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams
94b5(mdo sde): dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
94b6(mdo sde): na bza' dang
94b7(mdo sde): zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
94b8(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ston kyi dus kyi tshe dge slong dag skya rbab ser po'i nad kyis thebs te lus rid cing lus nyam chung bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni snyun mi mnga' zhing gnod pa med
95a1(mdo sde): la snyun gyis btab pa med de stobs dang ldan no/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong kha cig ni gdon kyi nad skya rbab ser pos thebs te
95a2(mdo sde): lus rid cing lus nyam chung bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ni snyun mi mnga' zhing gnod pa ma mchis te/ stobs dang ldan zhing rang bzhin gyis snyun mi mnga' la/ pho ba'i drod snyoms shing 'ju ba dang ldan pa
95a3(mdo sde): la gzigs/ bka' stsal pa dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags
95a4(mdo sde): pas na/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing bstsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i
95a5(mdo sde): khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin
95a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer
95a7(mdo sde): bA rA Na sI na/ rgyal po pad ma zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang 'thab pa dang rtsod pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang
95a8(mdo sde): chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrug la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /
95b1(mdo sde): rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa/ thams
95b2(mdo sde): cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ /de'i tshe bA rA Na sIr dus dang dus tshigs ma snyoms pa las mi nad chen po byung ste/ sems can
95b3(mdo sde): phal cher skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab bo/ /de nas rgyal pos de dag mthong nas snying rje skyed de/ /bdag gis 'di dag yongs su bskyab par bya zhing gso bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas yul thams cad na sman pa 'khod pa
95b4(mdo sde): rnams bsdus te/ bsgo nas sems can de dag gi nad kyi gzhi dang gnas dang snga nas gzhi yod pa rtogs nas/ de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyis gso ba dang sman thams cad bsdu bar byas so/ /de nas gsos te/ nor dang
95b5(mdo sde): sman dang nad g.yog dang ldan par byas kyang yun ring mo zhig lon gyi bar du sems can de dag gso ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal pos sman pa thams cad bkug ste gus par byas nas/ kye ci'i phyir sems can 'di
95b6(mdo sde): dag gso dka' bar gyur ces smras so/ /de nas sman pa rnams kyis dpyad de yon tan dang nyes pa gros mthun par gsol pa/ lha dus ma snyoms pa dang khams ma snyoms pa las gyur pa lags pas/ legs
95b7(mdo sde): pa ma rtogs mod kyi lha 'on kyang sman sna cig mchis te/ nya ro hi ta zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis pa gal te rnyed na ni des gso bar nus lags so/ /de nas rgyal po nya ro hi ta kun tu tshol ba la zhugs te des tshol ba'i
95b8(mdo sde): mi mang po bkye nas brtsal kyang ma rnyed do/ /de nas de dag gis rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po 'chag tu gshegs pa dang nad pa de dag kyang gcig tu 'dus te 'khod nas rgyal po la gsol
96a1(mdo sde): pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag nad 'di las yongs su bskyab cing srog stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos nad pa rnams kyi tshig snying rje rje skad zer zhing / sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra ba'i tshig thos
96a2(mdo sde): nas snying rjes snying bskyod de/ 'chi ma 'dzag cing bu bzhin du phyung nas bsams pa/ bdag gis gzhan sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams zhi bar byed kyang ma nus na bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di lta bu dang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di 'dra
96a3(mdo sde): ba ci dgos snyam mo/ /de snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal pos nor phal po che yongs su gtong ba byas te/ bu thu bo rgyal por bcug nas nye du dang skye bo rnams la nyes pa bshags te/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang blon po
96a4(mdo sde): rnams la bstod nas/ nad pa sdug pa rnams dbugs phyung ste brtul zhugs yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par blangs nas khang bzangs kyi steng du song ste/ bdug pa dang me tog dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa rnams
96a5(mdo sde): gtor nas shar phyogs su kha ltas te smon lam btab pa/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can rnams shin tu phongs par gyur te/ nad kyis yongs su gzir ba mthong nas bdag gis rang gi srog
96a6(mdo sde): phangs pa yongs su btang ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis bdag chu klung klog byed 'di'i nang du nya ro hi tar skye bar shog shig ces smras nas khang bzangs kyi steng nas bdag nyid kyis mchongs so/ /der
96a7(mdo sde): lhung ba'i mod la shi nas chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du nya bo che ro hi ta zhes bya bar skyes so/ /de nas lha rnams kyis yul thams cad du chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du nya bo che ro hi ta zhes bya ba skyes pa de ni/ nad tshabs po ches
96a8(mdo sde): gzir nas yun ring du lon pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi dang 'dra'o zhes sgra bsgrags so/ /de nas thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po ches lag na mtshon cha thogs nas skon pa khyer te dong nas/ nya de gson por mtshon cha rnon po rnam pa
96b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis sha rnams gcod pa la zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de yang de ltar lus gcod pa na/ sems can de dag la byams pas khyab par byas nas gdong mchi ma dron po 'dzag ste/ des bsams pa bdag
96b2(mdo sde): gi sha khrag gis sems can 'di dag bde bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rang gi sha khrag gis sems can de dag tshim par byas te/ bla na
96b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang sems ma log go/ /gang gi tshe sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe nya bo che ro hi ta des sgra bsgrags pa/ kye sems can dag khyed nyon cig /nga ni rgyal po
96b4(mdo sde): pad ma zhes bya ba de yin te ngas khyed kyi don du rang gi srog yongs su btang nas lus 'di lta bu blangs pa yin gyis/ nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang gang gi tshe nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
96b5(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ yang khyed nad las gtan du yongs su thar bar bya ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes byas so/ /
96b6(mdo sde): de skad thos nas/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag dang rgyal po dang blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis dad pa rnyed de/ me tog dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dag gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ shin tu dka' ba byed pa khyod
96b7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag cag khyod kyi nyan thos su gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du
96b8(mdo sde): sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po pad ma zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba byas pa des na nga 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su myong bar gyur la/
97a1(mdo sde): da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang / pho ba'i drod snyoms shing 'ju ba dang ldan te/ des na ngas zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang
97a2(mdo sde): myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar zhu bar gyur te/ nga nad med cing gnod pa med la nad med pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya'o/ sems can thams cad la snying rje
97a3(mdo sde): bsgom par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
97a4(mdo sde): do/ / //kham re zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha
97a5(mdo sde): rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang
97a6(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang
97a7(mdo sde): g zims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
97a8(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes pa
97b1(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can rnams kyis kyang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes su zin na ni/ de lta na kham gyi tha ma dang kham gyi mjug lus pa gang yin
97b2(mdo sde): pa de las kyang gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na/ de la ma byin nam/ bgo bsha' ma byas kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas bkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba zhig
97b3(mdo sde): na ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes pa bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i
97b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi shes pas na/ de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa 'am bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas bkris shing 'dug
97b5(mdo sde): go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bgo bsha' dag gi rnam par smin/ /ji ltar don ces 'gyur
97b6(mdo sde): ba de/ /drang srong chen pos gsungs pa bzhin/ /sems can rnams kyis shes na ni/ /ma sbyin par du mi za zhing / /ser sna can du mi 'gyur la/ /de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems/ /nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur na/ /
97b7(mdo sde): gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis/ /bsgribs pa rnams kyis ma shes pa/ /de phyir kun tu 'dzin sems kyis/ /rtag tu ma byin za bar byed/ /de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang / /sems ni kun nas bkris shing 'dug /
97b8(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i
98a1(mdo sde): bsngags pa yang bka' stsal la/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs
98a2(mdo sde): pas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod la/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang brjod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ ngas 'das pa'i dus na slong ba'i phyir bdag za ba'i kham khar 'ongs zin pa
98a3(mdo sde): las kyang yongs su btang ba de/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring
98a4(mdo sde): l a 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing
98a5(mdo sde): dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag
98a6(mdo sde): la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba gtong ba chen po
98a7(mdo sde): la gnas pa zhig go/ /phyis re shig na mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra bar mu ge chen po byung ngo / /de nas skye bo'i tshogs mu ge'i dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa bkres shing lkog ma dang 'gram
98a8(mdo sde): pa zhom pa/ yi dags kyi lus 'dra ba de dag 'dus shing tshogs la gcig tu 'phungs te/ rgyal po'i thad du dong nas rgyal bar gyur cig /sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod de smras pa/ lha bdag cag mu
98b1(mdo sde): ge'i 'jigs pa 'di las yongs su skyob cing srog stsal du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos mdzod pa la bos te/ kwa ye mdzod pa mdzod na zas dang skom bdag cag dang skye bo'i tshogs 'di rnams kyi
98b2(mdo sde): chog par yod dam zhes byas so/ /de thos nas mdzod srungs na re rtsis te lha la gsol bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /de nas rtsis mkhas pa rnams kyis rtsis na/ 'di srid cig gi bar du yul na 'khod pa thams
98b3(mdo sde): cad ni nyin gcig bzhin kham re re 'tshal la/ rgyal po ni zhal kham gnyis gnyis gsol ba mchis so zhes gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bos te bsgo ba/ 'o na khyed nyin gcig
98b4(mdo sde): bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang du shog la/ kham re re zos nas dengs shig ces byas so/ /de nas de dag nyin gcig bzhin du lhags te/ mi re kham re zos nas gar dga' bar 'dong bar byed do/ /de nas bram ze
98b5(mdo sde): gzhan zhig rtsis de'i nang du ma zhen te/ gzhan las gtam thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha rtsis mdzad par yul mi'i nang du bdag gis thos kyis bdag la 'ang kham gcig po de stsol cig ces byas so/ /
98b6(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos bdag nyid kham gnyis za ba las kham gcig bram ze la byin nas/ kham gcig ni yul mi dang thang mnyam par za bar byed do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug
98b7(mdo sde): ste/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma yul bA rA Na sI na/ rgyal po byed pa de ni shin tu dka' ba byed cing 'dug gis de bdag gis de la bgam par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid
98b8(mdo sde): bram ze'i cha lugs su sprul te/ gro la bab pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i thad du song nas rgyal bar gyur cig sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas smras pa/ lha bdag bkres kyis lha nyid kyi zhal kham cig
99a1(mdo sde): po des bdag la phan gdags par gsol/ de nas rgyal pos rang gi srog yongs su gtang bar chad nas/ snying rjes bdag gi kham cig po de bram ze la byin nas smyung bar 'dug ste/ de lta bu'i
99a2(mdo sde): tshul gyis zhag drug gi bar du zan bcad do/ /'on kyang skye bo phal po che de dag zan za ba mthong nas mchog tu dga' bar sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po de shin tu dka' ba byed pa mthong
99a3(mdo sde): nas bram ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/ rang gi gzugs su 'dug nas rgyal po la bstod pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ khyed dka' ba la zhugs pa 'dis bdag dga' bar gyur to/ /skye dgu
99a4(mdo sde): skyong ba 'di lta bu yod pa las na skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag ni mgon yod pa yin no/ /da sa bon thams cad thob cig ces yul phyogs su bsgo shig dang bdag gis zhag bdun na/ gang gis 'bru rnams rgyal bar 'gyur
99a5(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char dbab par bya'o zhes byas so/ /rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du byed du bcug go/ /brgya byin gyis kyang de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char phab ste/ des na mu ge de bzlog ste lo legs
99a6(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin de/ ngas de lta bu'i mu ge byung na yang rang gi
99a7(mdo sde): srog yongs su btang ste de lta bu'i sbyin pa dag byin no/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste sbyin pa dag sbyin no/ /bsod nams dag bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
99a8(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //chos skyong zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug
99b1(mdo sde): p o rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar
99b2(mdo sde): byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza'
99b3(mdo sde): dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe mi blun
99b4(mdo sde): po lhas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i phyir/ glang po che nor skyong yang btang dug gi phye mas kyang gtor/ gshed ma'i mi yang bkye ste/ de bcom ldan 'das la yun ring po nas gshed ma dang dgra dang mi mdza' bar
99b5(mdo sde): gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das ni de la byams pa'i dgongs pa dang phan pa'i dgongs pa dang thugs brtse ba'i dgongs pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
99b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar lhas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i slad du brtson par bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'di la byams pa'i dgongs pa dang phan pa'i dgongs pa dang thugs brtse ba'i dgongs pas nye bar gnas pa la
99b7(mdo sde): gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre
99b8(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar
100a1(mdo sde): che ba ci yod/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mug dang bcas pa na/ na so gzhon pa'i tshe gsod du 'ongs pa na yang / ngas 'di la sems sdang ba ma byas pa de legs
100a2(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba
100a3(mdo sde): dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba dang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang
100a4(mdo sde): ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la
100a5(mdo sde): phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa/ thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba zhig ste gtong ba chen po la gnas so/ /
100a6(mdo sde): rgyal po de la btsun mo blo ngan ma zhes bya ba gtum zhing khro la gzu lums can zhig yod de/ bu gcig pa chos skyong zhes bya ba yang blo ngan ma de nyid las btsas so/ /gzhon nu chos skyong de yang dad pa dang ldan la/
100a7(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste/ de yang bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag
100a8(mdo sde): rnams kyis mthong na sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no/ /de nas de mkhan po'i thad du song nas byis pa dag dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob bo/ /phyis re shig na rgyal po dpyid kyi dus kyi
100b1(mdo sde): tshe/ shing rnams me tog rgyas pa dang ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du/ btsun mo dam pa dang bcas pa'i btsun mo'i
100b2(mdo sde): 'khor gyis zhabs 'bring byas te skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ste/ skyed mos tshal de na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig rtse ba las btsun mo blo ngan ma phrag dog dang khro bas non te 'khrugs so/ /rgyal
100b3(mdo sde): pos ni de la skom 'thungs pa'i phyed bskur ba dang / de 'khrugs pas rgyal po la phrin spring ba gal te bdag khyod kyis 'thungs pa'i phyed 'thung bar gyur na/ bdag bu'i khrag 'thung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /'dod
100b4(mdo sde): pa sten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med de/ de nas rgyal po tshangs pas sbyin chos can yin mod kyi/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas bkris pa med par gyur nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis phe'u
100b5(mdo sde): btab kyang khro ba'i me 'bar te de je thur khros nas/ khyed deng la khye'u chos skyong gi mgul ba chod de de la khrag blud cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas khye'u chos skyong byis pa'i grwa khang na 'dug pas thos nas/ ngus te 'di skad
100b6(mdo sde): du 'khor ba na sems can mi mthun pa ni tha chad yin te 'di ltar khro ba'i dbang gis rang gi lus las byung ba'i bu yang gsod par byed do zhes smras so/ /de nas khye'u chos skyong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/
100b7(mdo sde): yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba/ yab cig pa'o 'tshal la ni bu sdug la bdag gis kyang nongs pa ma bgyis na bdag mi dgum par ci gnang / rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ bu sdug gal te khyod
100b8(mdo sde): kyi mas bzod na ni ngas kyang bzod par bya'o/ /de nas chos skyong ma'i thad du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ yum bzod pa mdzod la bdag gsod du ma stsal cig /ces smras so/ /
101a1(mdo sde): de skad du snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la/ gti zhing smra ba'i tshig thos kyang des bzod pa ma byas so/ /de nas gshed ma rnams kyis mtshon rnon pos khye'u chos skyong gi mgul pa bcad
101a2(mdo sde): de/ btsun mo blo ngan ma la khrag blud na 'on gyang blo ngan ma 'gyod pa yang med do/ /khye'u chos skyong ni pha ma dang gshed ma rnams la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
101a3(mdo sde): dag ji snyams du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos skyong zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/ /btsun mo blo ngan ma ni lhas byin 'di kho na yin te de'i tshe gshed ma'i lag tu song ba na yang 'di la byams pa'i
101a4(mdo sde): sems bskyed la/ da ltar nga la gsad par brtson na yang nga 'di la byams par sems phan par sems snying brtse bar sems so/ /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la
101a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
101a6(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //zhi ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang
101a7(mdo sde): lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu
101a8(mdo sde): dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims
101b1(mdo sde): cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du
101b2(mdo sde): yod pa na dge slong dag 'dus pa chen po gnyis su gyur te/ gcig ni dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas par dam 'cha'o/ /gcig ni ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar du dbyar gnas par dam 'cha' ste/ der dge slong dag lhung bzed
101b3(mdo sde): rnams kha dog sgyur bar byed chos gos 'khru zhing btso blag byed tshem bu rnams 'drub par byed do/ /de nas re shig na dge slong zhig chos gos 'drub par 'dod de khab kyi mig tu skud pa gzhug ma nus nas snying rje rje skad zer
101b4(mdo sde): zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra ste/ 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa su yod/ 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa su yod ces zer ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang de dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'chag sa na 'chag cing bzhugs so/ /
101b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang nas/ gdangs zab cing snyan la zur phyin pa dang bya ka la ping ka'i skad lta bur yid du 'ong ba rnga bo che'i sgra ltar snyan pa'i gsung gis bka'
101b6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong nga ni 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa'o/ /de nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa thos nas gus par bsgrim pas la gor du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
101b7(mdo sde): nas bzung ste rang gi mgo la gzhag nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi phyag 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang
101b8(mdo sde): shes rab bsags na/ 'on kyang da dung bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du dge slong nga ni 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa'o zhes gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong nga ni bsod nams
102a1(mdo sde): kyis chog mi shes te/ dge slong ngas ni bsod nams kyi ro myong bas na de'i phyir nga bsod nams kyis chog mi shes so/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
102a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams kyis chog mi mkhyen pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs
102a3(mdo sde): pa 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa las yongs su grol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa/
102a4(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa 'di lta bu la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti
102a5(mdo sde): mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba'i tshe/ nga bsod nams kyi 'du byed
102a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis chog mi shes pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po'i pho brang zhi ba'i sgra chen zhes bya ba na/ rgyal po zhi ldan zhes bya ba
102a7(mdo sde): rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang
102a8(mdo sde): 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la/
102b1(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba
102b2(mdo sde): gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ /de nas de nang par sngar langs te mchod sbyin gyi 'dun khang du song nas zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed do/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin par byed/ gos 'dod pa
102b3(mdo sde): rnams la ni gos sbyin par byed cing / nor dang 'bru dang mgron bu dang gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru rnams yongs su gtong bar byed do/ /'on kyang de bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams
102b4(mdo sde): kyis chog mi shes so/ /de btsun mo'i 'khor du song nas btsun mo'i 'khor la zas dang skom sbyin par byed do/ /bu rnams dang blon po rnams dang dpa' bo dang ru mchog dang grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang yul mi rnams la
102b5(mdo sde): zas dang skom sbyin par byed do/ /de nas rgyal po zhi ldan 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis mi rnams ni tshim par byas na srog chags phra mo rnams lus pa de dag ci zhig gis tshim par bya snyam mo/ /des bdog
102b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad yongs su gtang bas gos ya cig tsam gyon par zad de lus nyi tshe las par gyur nas bsams pa/ srog chags phra mo rnams la ni rang gi lus sbyin par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lus bzhogs nas
102b7(mdo sde): gang na sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu rings la sogs pa yod pa der lus bor te 'dug nas bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du khrag gis tshim par byas so/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba
102b8(mdo sde): 'jug ste de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci rgyal po zhi ldan 'di sems can rnams kyi don du 'di ltar byed dam/ 'on te snying rjes byed cig gu snyam nas bdag gis 'di bgam par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bya rgod stang zil
103a1(mdo sde): bcag pa'i 'phro lta bu dang gnag tsa'i mdog can lta bur bdag nyid sprul te/ rgyal po zhi ldan gyi thad du song nas mchus mig bru bar gzas na yang rgyal po de skrag par ni ma gyur gyi/ byams pa'i mig chen pos bya rgod
103a2(mdo sde): de la bltas nas smras pa/ bu nga'i lus las gang 'dod pa las ci dga' mgur gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dga' bar gyur te/ bram ze'i cha lugs su sprul nas rgyal po zhi ldan gyi mdun du 'greng ste
103a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rgyal po legs kyis khyod kyi mig gnyis nga la byin cig rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze nga'i lus 'di la 'gog pa su yang med kyis ci 'dod pa khyer cig ces byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lhag par dga'
103a4(mdo sde): bar gyur nas bram ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/ rang gi gzugs su 'dug nas rgyal po la smro ba bskyed de smras pa/ kye rgyal po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi blo shin tu nges so khyod kyi smon lam bskyod du med do/ /
103a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams la khyod kyi snying rje chen po'i rgyun 'bab par gyur to/ /khyod 'jigs par bya ba'i chos rnams la 'di ltar 'jigs pa med pa las na khyod ring po mi thogs par brtson pa 'dis/ bla na med pa yang dag par
103a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zhi ldan du gyur pa gang
103a7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni nga yin te/ de'i tshe yang nga bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa rnams kyis chog ma shes na da ltar lta ci smos/ dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste sbyin pa dag sbyin no/ /bsod nams dag
103a8(mdo sde): bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gzugs
103b1(mdo sde): bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin
103b2(mdo sde): rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye
103b3(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
103b4(mdo sde): bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang
103b5(mdo sde): bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog bshad de/ /'khor brgya phrag du mas kyang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das la chos ro dang ldan no cog mnyan pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad
103b6(mdo sde): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sems can 'di rnams chos rin po che'i snod du yang gyur te/ gus par mnyan par sems pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
103b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar gus pa bskyed de chos mnyan pa dang bzung ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po gzugs
103b8(mdo sde): bzang zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad
104a1(mdo sde): rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dad pa dang
104a2(mdo sde): ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba chags pa med par
104a3(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ /de nas rgyal po de la btsun mo mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig yod do/ /bu gcig
104a4(mdo sde): pa mdzes ldan zhes bya ba sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba bzod pa dang ldan pa mi mthun pa med pa zhig kyang yod do/ /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po gzugs bzang chos 'dod par gyur nas des blon po thams cad
104a5(mdo sde): bsogs te smras pa/ yul gyi gtso bo dag nga chos 'dod kyis nga'i chos tshol cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas blon po de dag gis thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po chos ni dkon te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na
104a6(mdo sde): gdod chos 'byung ngo zhes gda'o/ /de nas rgyal pos gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas nga'i yul na chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gser 'bum yod pa'i
104a7(mdo sde): snod 'di sbyin no/ /bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur zhing bstod par bya'o zhes kyang byas so/ /de nas yun ring po zhig lon kyang chos smra ba su yang mi snang ngo / /de nas rgyal po chos kyi phyir gdung zhing yi chad do/ /lha'i dbang
104a8(mdo sde): po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/ des rgyal po chos kyi phyir phongs shing 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po gzugs bzang bgam par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bdag nyid
104b1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rkang lag dang mig mi sdug pa zhig tu sprul nas/ rgyal po 'khor du ma'i nang na 'dug pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci khyod chos 'dod ce na/ ngas khyod la chos bston to/ /de nas rgyal pos chos kyi sgra thos pas dga'
104b2(mdo sde): zhing mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas gnod sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa chos smros shig ngas mnyan par bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/ kye ma rgyal po chen po bde zhing 'khod pa ni chos smra bar byed kyi nga ni bkres kyis
104b3(mdo sde): je zan byin cig / de nas rgyal pos de thos nas/ zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la 'di'i bza' ba dang bca' ba'i rnam pa dag 'on cig ces bsgo'o/ /gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/ nga ni 'phral la bsad pa'i sha dang khrag za
104b4(mdo sde): zhing 'thung ba yin gyis bu gcig pa mdzes ldan 'di nga la byin cig / de nas rgyal pos de thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur te/ brgya lam na lan cig deng lta zhig chos kyi sgra dang phrad na de yang rin thang gdab du med
104b5(mdo sde): pas nyo dgos so snyam mo/ /de nas gzhon nu mdzes ldan gyis de thos nas yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ lha bzod pa mdzad de lha'i dgongs pa rdzogs par mdzad la bdag gsang ba pa'i zas su stsal bar
104b6(mdo sde): gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba bzod pa dang ldan pa mi mthun pa med pa de chos kyi don du gnod sbyin la byin no/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyis rang gi
104b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po dang 'khor rnams la khye'u yi yan lag dang nying lag rnams so sor bcad cing bcad cing zos pa dang khrag kyang 'thungs par bstan to/ /rgyal po des mthong na chos 'dod pa'i phyir
104b8(mdo sde): mi dga' bar ma gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po la smras pa/ rgyal po nga ma 'grangs kyis yang byin cig ces byas so/ /rgyal pos de la snying du sdug pa'i chung ma yang byin no/ /de nas de yang thabs
105a1(mdo sde): de kho na ltar zos par bston to/ /de nas yang rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po nga da dung ma 'grangs so/ /de nas rgyal pos gnod sbyin la smras pa/ bu ngas bu gcig pa dang sdug pa'i chung ma yang byin zin na yang
105a2(mdo sde): ci 'dod/ gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/ rang gi lus nga la byin cig dang des dan nga 'grangs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te rang gi lus khyod la byin na ngas ji ltar chos mnyan gyis/ sngar nga la chos je ston dang
105a3(mdo sde): ngas chos thos pa 'og tu rang gi lus yongs su btang bar bya'o zhes byas so/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po dam gyi 'og tu bcug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du chos bstan pa/ sdug pa dag la mya ngan skye/ /sdug pa
105a4(mdo sde): dag las 'jigs pa skye/ /'jigs pa dag las rnam grol rnams/ /mya ngan med na ga la 'jigs/ /de nas rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos ma thag tu yid rab tu sim par gyur te/ dbang po dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas gnod
105a5(mdo sde): sbyin la smras pa/ gnod sbyin nga'i lus 'di ji dga' bar gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo bar rig nas/
105a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar byas te/ rang gi gzugs su 'dug nas dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas lag pa ya cig gis ni bu bzung ya cig gis ni chung ma bzung nas rgyal po spro ba bskyed de smras pa/
105a7(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi go cha brtan gyis brtson pa 'dis ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyi sdug pa'i mi dang
105a8(mdo sde): phrad pa yang 'di yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka bdag gi chos kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
105b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de nga yin no/ /gzhon nu mdzes ldan ni kun dga' bo yin no/ /mdzes ldan ma ni grags
105b2(mdo sde): 'dzin ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe yang ngas chos kyi phyir gnyen sdug pa yongs su gtong ba dang rang gi srog yongs su gtong ba byas na da ltar lta ci smos/ dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ chos
105b3(mdo sde): la bkur sti bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mo bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /chos la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab

105b7(mdo sde): dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims
105b8(mdo sde): c ha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
106a1(mdo sde): so der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang legs par mchod pa byed pa dang legs par g.yog byed pa'i
106a2(mdo sde): khyim de dag ni tshangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la

106a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang legs par mchod pa byed pa dang legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /

106a8(mdo sde): ni rigs pa'i sgo nas lha dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

107a2(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las bu dag byung yang shi bar gyur
107a3(mdo sde): te/ de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam

107a8(mdo sde): du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te gsum gang zhe na pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang ma dus la bab
107b1(mdo sde): cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can

108a7(mdo sde): bo'i bu mo zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u mdza' bo'i bu mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la
108a8(mdo sde): gtad nas/ ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /
108b1(mdo sde): de'i pha ni rgya mtsho chen por song nas de nyid du shi'o/ /de nas gang gi tshe mdza' bo'i bu mo cher skyes pa de'i tshe ma la smras pa/ yum bdag gi pha sngon las ji lta bu zhig gis 'tsho bar gyur/ bdag gis kyang de'i rjes
108b2(mdo sde): su de dang 'dra bar bgyi 'tshal lo/ /de nas mas bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di la rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong pa byed byed do zhes byas na ni/ 'di yang brgya la rgya mtsho chen por song na de nyid du 'chi bar 'ong ngo
108b3(mdo sde): snyam nas smras pa/ bu khyod kyi pha ni sngon yul tshong pa byed byed kyis khyod kyang 'dod na yul tshong pa gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas des yul tshong pa'i las byas na dang po'i nyin par kar Sha pa Na bzhi rnyed de/ de ma la byin nas yum
108b4(mdo sde): 'dis dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa mdzod cig ces byas so/ /de nas re shig na gzhan zhig na re khyod kyi pha spos kyi tshong pa byed byed do zhes byas pa dang / des yul tshong pa'i las btang
108b5(mdo sde): te spos kyi tshong byas so/ /de nas kar Sha pa Na brgyad rnyed de/ de dag kyang des ma la byin no/ /de nas re shig na gzhan zhig na re khyod kyi pha gser dngul gyi tshong pa byed byed do zhes byas pa dang / des spos 'tshong ba btang ste/ gser
108b6(mdo sde): dang dngul gyi tshong byas so/ /de nas dang po'i nyin par kar Sha pa Na bcu drug rnyed de/ de dag kyang des ma la byin no/ /de nas phyi de nyin par kar Sha pa Na sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnyed de de dag kyang des ma la byin no/ /de nas re shig na
108b7(mdo sde): gser dngul gyi tshong pa phrag dog gi rang bzhin can dag gis khye'u de gnas thams cad kyi nyo tshong gi rgyus shes par rig nas smras pa/ mdza' bo'i bu mo khyod kyi pha ni rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong pa byed byed na/ ci khyod la chos ma yin
108b8(mdo sde): pa'i 'tsho ba 'di ci dgos khyod sus sems can ngan pa'i nyo tshong gi las byed du bcug ces byas so/ /de nas de gser dngul gyi tshong pa'i tshig gis bskul nas ma'i thad du song ste smras pa/ yum bdag gi pha sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i
109a1(mdo sde): tshong pa byed byed ces de skad grag pas/ bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig mas smras pa bu gcig de ni bden mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod byis pa yin la bu gcig pa gang
109a2(mdo sde): yang yin gyis nga bor te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du ma 'gro shig / de nas de mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen phrag dog gi rang bzhin can dag gis brid pas ldog tu ma btub nas/ des ma'i tshig ma mnyan te grong khyer bA
109a3(mdo sde): rA Na sIr dril bsgrags nas/ kye bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams khyed nyon cig /ded dpon mdza' bo'i bu mo rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gro bar chad kyis khyed kyi nang nas ded dpon mdza' bo'i bu mo dang lhan cig
109a4(mdo sde): t u sho gam mi dgos pa dang la gcan gyi btsas mi dgos pa gru btsas mi dgos par rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gro 'dod pa de dag rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sta gon gyis shig ces byas nas dge mtshan dang
109a5(mdo sde): bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba rnams byas te/ g.yog 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig chas te/ shing rta dang khur dang sgye dang skon pa dang rnga mo dang ba lang dang bong bu dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i
109a6(mdo sde): zong bskyas so/ /de'i ma ni snying byams pas ci bya gtol med nas mchi ma 'dzag cing ngu bzhin phyung ste rkang pa la 'jus nas bu gcig nga bor te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du ma 'gro shig ces byas so/ /de ltar snying rje
109a7(mdo sde): rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smre ba'i skad phyung yang des brtul te ma'i mgo bo la rdog pas snun nas 'gron po rnams dang chas so/ /de nas mas smras pa/ bu khyod kyis las 'di'i rnam par smin
109a8(mdo sde): pa myong bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas re shig na des grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang yul po che de dag mthong nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin to/ /de nas des kar Sha pa Na lnga brgyas gru nyos
109b1(mdo sde): nas zho shas 'tsho ba rnam pa lnga ste gru pa dang chu 'phyag pa dang mnyan pa dang byi'u bzul mkhan dang ru skya 'dzin pa rnams kyang khrid de lan gsum dril bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so/ /de nas re
109b2(mdo sde): shig na gru de nya'i rigs chu srin ma ga ras ma rung bar byas te bub par byas so/ /de nas mdza' bo'i bu mos spang leb gcig la zin nas skam la phyin to/ /de nas skam la song song nas thag ring po zhig nas grong khyer
109b3(mdo sde): longs spyod byed ces bya ba mthong nas/ de de'i logs su song ba dang re shig na de'i nang nas lha'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa bzhi zhig byung nas/ de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa
109b4(mdo sde): legs so/ /'di dag ni bdag cag gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gzims khang lags te/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru
109b5(mdo sde): ca dang gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba lags kyi tshur spyon dang longs spyad par bgyi'o zhes zer nas/ de de dag dang lhan cig tu lo du mar dga' ba myong ste/ 'di ltar de ni bsod nams byed byed pa dang dge ba
109b6(mdo sde): byed byed pa dang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba las 'gror mi ster nas/ de lho phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang lhag par yang der 'gro 'dod par gyur nas
109b7(mdo sde): r e shig na yang lho phyogs su song ba dang grong khyer rtag tu myos shes bya ba mthong ste de de'i sgor phyin pa dang re shig na de'i nang nas kyang lha'i bu mo ches gzugs bzang zhing ches lta na sdug la ches mdzes pa
109b8(mdo sde): brgyad byung nas de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa legs so/ /'di dag ni bdag cag gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gzims khang lags te/
110a1(mdo sde): nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba lags kyis tshur spyon dang longs spyad par bgyi'o zhes zer nas/ de de dag dang lhan cig tu lo du
110a2(mdo sde): mar dga' ba myong ste/ 'di ltar de ni bsod nams byed byed pa dang dge ba byed byed pa dang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i yang lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba las 'gror mi ster nas/ de lho
110a3(mdo sde): phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang lhag par yang der 'gro 'dod par gyur nas re shig na yang lho phyogs su song ba dang grong khyer dga' byed ces bya ba mthong ste/ de de'i sgor phyin pa dang re shig na de'i nang nas kyang lha'i bu mo
110a4(mdo sde): ches gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la ches mdzes pa bcu drug byung nas de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa legs so/ /'di dag ni bdag cag gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang
110a5(mdo sde): gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gzims khang lags te nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba lags kyis tshur spyon dang longs spyad par bgyi'o/ /
110a6(mdo sde): zhes zer nas/ de de dag dang lhan cig tu lo du mar dga' ba myong ste/ 'di ltar de ni bsod nams byed byed pa dang dge ba byed byed pa dang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i yang lho phyogs kyi lam du
110a7(mdo sde): song ba las 'gror mi ster nas de lho phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang lhag par yang de 'gro 'dod par gyur nas/ re shig na yang lho phyogs su song ba dang khang bzangs tshangs pa'i bla ma zhes bya ba mthong ste/ de de'i sgor
110a8(mdo sde): phyin pa dang re shig na de'i nang nas kyang lha'i bu mo ches gzugs bzang zhing ches lta na sdug la ches mdzes pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ste/ de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa legs so/ /'di dag ni bdag cag
110b1(mdo sde): gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gzims khang lags te/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su

110b3(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i yang lho phyogs su song ba las 'gror mi ster nas/ de lho phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang / lhag par yang der 'gro 'dod de ji tsam du lho phyogs su song ba de tsam du de'i 'dod
110b4(mdo sde): pa skye'o/ /re shig na yang lho phyogs su song ba dang lcags kyi 'khar zhig mthong ste/ de de'i nang du song ba dang nang du song ma thag tu de'i sgo gcad do/ /de nas de bas kyang nang du song ba dang de'i sgo yang bcad do/ /
110b5(mdo sde): de bas kyang nang du song ba dang re shig na mi bo che zhig mthong na/ de'i mgo bo la lcags kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa zhig 'khor zhing 'dug la de'i
110b6(mdo sde): mgo bo las gnag khrag ci 'dzag pa rnams de'i zas su za'o/ /de nas mdza' bo'i bu mos mi de la dris pa/ kwa'i mi khyod su yin/ de na re nga ni ma la gnod pa byed byed pa yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /mi des
110b7(mdo sde): smras ma thag tu mdza' bo'i bu mos las dran nas nga yang ma la gnod pa byed byed pa yin pa snyam gyis/ nga yang las de kho nas 'dir khrid pa lta snyam mo/ /de nas de'i skabs su nam mkha' las sgra byung ste/ bcings pa
110b8(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag ni grol bar gyur to/ /grol ba gang yin pa de dag ni bcings so zhes zer te de skad zer ma thag tu mi de'i mgo bo la 'khor lo mi snang bar gyur nas mdza' bo'i bu mo'i mgo bo la byung ngo / /de nas mi des mdza' bo'i
111a1(mdo sde): bu mo sdug bsngal gyis dkos thag pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyed ni longs byed rtag tu myos/ /dga' byed tshangs pa'i bla ma yi/ /khang bzangs las ni thal nas kyang / /ci yi phyir na 'di ru 'ongs/ /
111a2(mdo sde): mdza' bo'i bu mos smras pa/ bdag ni longs byed rtag tu myos/ /dga' byed tshangs pa'i bla ma yi/ /khang bzangs las ni thal nas kyang / /'dod chen gyis ni 'dir 'ongs so/ /las kyis ring du khrid par byed/ /ring po nas kyang
111a3(mdo sde): las kyis khrid/ /gang du las kyi rnam par smin/ /der ni las kyis khrid par byed/ /las kyi rnam smin gang zhig gis/ /bdag gi srog ni gcod byed pa/ /kun tu 'bar zhing rab 'bar ba'i/ /'khor lo mgo la 'khor bar
111a4(mdo sde): gyur/ /mi des smras pa/ khyod kyis rab tu sdang sems kyis/ /ma cig dka' ba byed bed pa'i/ /mgo bor rdog pas bsnun pas na/ /de yi las kyi 'bras bu yin/ /mdza' bo'i bu mos smras pa/ lo grangs stong phrag
111a5(mdo sde): du yi bar/ /bdag gi srog ni gcod byed pa/ /kun tu 'bar zhing rab 'bar ba'i/ /'khor lo mgo la 'khor bar 'gyur/ /mi des smras pa/ lo ni stong phrag drug bcu dang / /brgya phrag drug bcu'i bar srid du/ /lcags
111a6(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba ni/ /khyod kyi mgo la 'khor bar 'gyur/ /mdza' bo'i bu mos smras pa/ kye gzhan yang 'dir 'ong ba dga' lta yod dam/ mi des smras pa/ su 'di lta bu'i las byed byed pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
111a7(mdo sde): mdza' bo'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed de/ mi de la smras pa/ kye nga ni sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'khor lo 'di mgo bo'i steng du 'dzin par 'dod kyis/ 'di
111a8(mdo sde): lta bu'i las byed byed pa gzhan su yang 'dir 'ong bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /de skad ces smras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' mdza' bo'i bu mo'i 'khor lo de/ mgo las gyen du 'phags nas ta la bdun srid tsam du
111b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'dug go/ /de ni shi nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' bo'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa
111b2(mdo sde): de ni nga yin te/ ngas nyo tshong byas nas ma la kar Sha pa Na phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni grong khyer chen po bzhir bde ba chen po myong ngo / /ngas ma la gnod pa chung ngu byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni de lta bu'i sdug
111b3(mdo sde): bsngal myong ngo / /dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste pha ma la bkur sti bya'o/ /gnod pa mi bya'o/ /'on kyang mdza' bo'i bu mo so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe nyes pa de dag lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ de nyid du
111b4(mdo sde): lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gang yin pa de lta bu ni thob par 'gyur zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag bu'i pha ma gnyis ni dka' ba byed byed pa dang skom ldud pa dang gso ba dang skyed pa dang
111b5(mdo sde): nu ma snun pa dang 'dzam bu'i gling bkra ba ston pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te bus pha ma gnyis phrag pa g.yas g.yon du bzhag ste/ lo brgya'i bar du khyer ram/ yang na sa chen po 'di nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang

111b7(mdo sde): d rin sobs pa 'am phan gdags par mi 'gyur gyi gang gi pha ma de gnyis dad pa med pa las dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la 'dzud pa dang 'dul ba dang gnas par byed pa dang 'jog par byed pa dang tshul khrims
111b8(mdo sde): 'chal pa las tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang ser sna can las gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang shes rab 'chal pa las shes rab phun sum tshogs pa la 'dzud pa dang / 'dul ba dang gnas par byed pa
112a1(mdo sde): dang 'jog par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ bus pha ma gnyis la drin bsabs pa 'am phan btags par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom
112a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //ri bong zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams
112a3(mdo sde): d ang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa
112a4(mdo sde): byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'
112a5(mdo sde): dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
112a6(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran
112a7(mdo sde): pa zhig yod de/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba
112a8(mdo sde): brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig btsas nas de bskyed bsrings te cher gyur to/ /de'i pha ni nor yang zad par gyur longs spyod kyang zad par gyur to/ /de yang mdza' bo dang nye du dang rtsa lag gi 'dab che ba
112b1(mdo sde): zhig ste/ bu de dus dus su nye du rnams kyi thad du gtong ngo / /de nas de nye du de dag gis ci nas de dag kyang phyir zhing mdza' bar gyur pa de lta bur bzhen to/ /phyis re shig na de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas
112b2(mdo sde): des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma
112b3(mdo sde): stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun tu bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i
112b4(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos pas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
112b5(mdo sde): la yon tan du lta bar 'gyur te/ pha ma gnyis kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de de ltar rab tu byung nas nye du de dag dang lhan cig tu 'du zhing gnas so/ /de nas
112b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyim pa dang 'du ba las bzlog nas dgon par gnas pa la 'dzud par mdzad na de der mi dga'o/ /de nas de bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar du khyim pa dang 'du ba las
112b7(mdo sde): bzlog par mdzad de/ bu khyim pa dang 'du ba 'di ni nyes pa du ma dang ldan te/ mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang phangs pa dang snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang 'dod
112b8(mdo sde): p a dang ldan pa dang chags par 'gyur ba dang tsher ma dang 'dra ba dang rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang lus kyis shes par bya ba'i
113a1(mdo sde): reg bya rnams dang sdug pa dang phangs pa dang snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang chags par 'gyur ba dang tsher ma dang 'dra ba dag yod do zhes gsungs so/ /gang du gnas
113a2(mdo sde): bcas na/ dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dgon pa'i yon tan dag kyang rnam grangs du mar bsngags so/ /de nas re shig na rigs kyi bu des dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten
113a3(mdo sde): nas dgon par gnas pa la yang rtag tu brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang
113a4(mdo sde): ltung ba dang rnam par mthor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i
113a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rtsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
113a6(mdo sde): pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i brnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par
113a7(mdo sde): smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas des sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran la bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu dka' ba spyod pa yang mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste gus pa dang bcas pas bstod cing ri
113a8(mdo sde): mo byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu 'di lan gsum gyi
113b1(mdo sde): bar du grong nas bzlog ste/ dgon pa'i gnas la btsud pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags
113b2(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams
113b3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu 'di lan gsum gyi bar du grong nas bzlog ste/ dgon pa'i gnas la btsud pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag
113b4(mdo sde): pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
113b5(mdo sde): dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba'i tshe yang ngas rang gi srog yongs su btang nas/ rigs kyi bu 'di grong nas bzlog ste dgon pa'i gnas la btsud pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid
113b6(mdo sde): la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri'i sul chu 'bab cing me tog dang 'bras bu dang rdo gu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po
113b7(mdo sde): spyod pa zas su 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dang chus 'tsho ba ri dgas kyi g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun gyon pa me'i sbyin sreg byed pa zhig 'dug go/ /drang srong de'i mdza' bo yang ri bong mi'i skad
113b8(mdo sde): shes pa zhig yod de/ de nyin gcig bzhin du drang srong gi thad du dus gsum du 'gro'o/ /der song nas gus par smra ba byas te/ gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par
114a1(mdo sde): dga' bar byas nas de gnyis phyir zhing mdza' bar gyur te pha spad dang 'dra bar 'dug go/ /phyis re shig na than chen byung nas des chu klung dang khron pa rnams chu chung bar gyur la shing rnams kyang me tog dang 'bras bu med
