134b8(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gis yi dags de dag bsams na yul ma ga d+hA thog thag na yang mi snang la/ mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na yang de na yang mi snang ngo / /de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong
135a1(mdo sde): ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang de na yang mi snang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda'

135a7(mdo sde): lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi dags phyi bzhin song / /yi dags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de dag myur du thar gyur cig /ces gsungs so/ /

135b1(mdo sde): sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las
135b2(mdo sde): gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas yi dags las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i
135b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te bzod bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas
135b4(mdo sde): sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul du thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprika la la sogs
135b5(mdo sde): pas byugs pa de rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu ta dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od
135b6(mdo sde): chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams
135b7(mdo sde): kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo/ /de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du
135b8(mdo sde): gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis yi dags mang po dag lha'i nang du
136a1(mdo sde): bkod nas de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chos bstan nas de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mthong bar 'gyur ba rnyed nas/ dong ba de ni khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te legs so legs so/ /
136a2(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la yang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur sti byas so/ /maud gal gyi bu de bas

136a6(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
136a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab
136a8(mdo sde): na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa rgya che zhing yangs pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/
136b1(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas
136b2(mdo sde): de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig btsas nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rgyu skar chu smad la btsas
136b3(mdo sde): pas na de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming chu smad ces btags so/ /de nas khye'u chu smad bsrings bskyed de cher skyes nas/ de'i pha shi ba dang rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to/ /de nas des tshong 'dus
136b4(mdo sde): bkram nas nyo 'tshong byed cing nyo 'tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las de nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ de bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang dam pa'i chos thos pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur
136b5(mdo sde): nas de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig /de nas de'i mas smras pa/ bu khyod ni bu gcig pa yin
136b6(mdo sde): gyis bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar rab tu ma byung shig / bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro/ /chu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa
136b7(mdo sde): dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas so/ /de'i ma de ni brkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste kar Sha pa Na de dag sbas nas/ dge slong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de
136b8(mdo sde): khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni yi dags su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro/ /bu de la yang slu bar byed de/ bdag gis nyin gcig bzhin du dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro/ /
137a1(mdo sde): phyis re shig na de shi ba dang de yi dags su skyes nas bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed do/ /sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang
137a2(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad

137a4(mdo sde): du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur
137a5(mdo sde): sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ des chu klung gang gA'i 'gram du lo ma'i spyil po byas te bsam gtan byed do/ /de'i ma yi dags

137b1(mdo sde): kyang ma mthong na/ /kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong / /'bras bur ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi/ /drung song de dag 'bras med 'gyur/ /gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang / /de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur/ /

137b3(mdo sde): mir gyur pa'i tshe bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/ yi dags mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin bsod nams dag kyang

137b7(mdo sde): ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo tsha/ yi dags mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o/ /de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos

138a1(mdo sde): gis yi dags mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas shin du skyo ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang

138a3(mdo sde): dgas phyi bzhin song / /yi dags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du thar gyur cig /ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas yi dags mo de dang skye bo mang po la de dang mthun pa'i chos

138a6(mdo sde): mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgribs te/ /khyod kyis yi dags 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi/ /khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha med
138a7(mdo sde): pa/ /rus pa lpags pa skyi rnams da dung 'dug /ces byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis lan mang du spyos nas smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu de las ras zung gcig thob bo/ /de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun
138a8(mdo sde): la phul te/ gang gis dge 'dun las ras zung shig nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyi rdang la bzhag go/ /de nas yi dags mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas rkus so/ /de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas
138b1(mdo sde): chu smad song ste yi dags mo spyos nas phyir bkug ste byin no/ /de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las rkus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug te byin pa dang / dge slong des kyang de gshags nas/ phyogs
138b2(mdo sde): bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to/ /de nas des phyin chad ma rkus so/ /de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser snas mtho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas kyang yi dags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu
138b3(mdo sde): dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
138b4(mdo sde): la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang
138b5(mdo sde): p hyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams
138b6(mdo sde): k yis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
138b7(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med
138b8(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo / /mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms
139a1(mdo sde): byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste yi dags kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du
139a2(mdo sde): 'dug pa rang gi skras yog pa lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang / de gnad la bab ste
139a3(mdo sde): bkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/ sring mo khyod
139a4(mdo sde): kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug yi dags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang de khyod la bdag gi
139a5(mdo sde): las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag
139a6(mdo sde): 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang ldan pa'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan
139a7(mdo sde): no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
139a8(mdo sde): pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' byed tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da bzod ga las 'ongs/ dga' byed kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dags rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der
139b1(mdo sde): bdag gis yi dags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du mchis pa rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun
139b2(mdo sde): nas sha bkum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang / de gnad la bab bste bkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang
139b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug /rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bur mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/ /de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/ /rus pa'i 'phrul
139b4(mdo sde): 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/ /ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/ /dub cing sdug bsngal dag gi nyen/ /nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /
139b5(mdo sde): de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed yi dags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed
139b6(mdo sde): byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
139b7(mdo sde): na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
139b8(mdo sde): bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /
140a1(mdo sde): de nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/ des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ des pha ma la gsol nas bcom
140a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas/ de de na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las re shig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab
140a3(mdo sde): pa'i bzhi la lhod par byas so/ /de nas dge slong ma rnams gyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do/ /de nas des sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba 'ang gcod du bcug /slob pa dang mi slob pa'i
140a4(mdo sde): dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsums te 'dug go/ /dga' byed ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi
140a5(mdo sde): dgas mo 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni yi dags su skyes so/ /des nor ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor to/ /des slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams
140a6(mdo sde): kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas ni de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/ /dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to/ /dga' byed de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam
140a7(mdo sde): par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur
140a8(mdo sde): ro/ /dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
140b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan
140b2(mdo sde): dag kyang rtogs nas/ ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang
140b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
140b4(mdo sde): ' das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding
140b5(mdo sde): rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
140b6(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas mnyan
140b7(mdo sde): du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing
140b8(mdo sde): rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu
141a1(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po
141a2(mdo sde): che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
141a3(mdo sde): de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kun la grags pa
141a4(mdo sde): dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to/ /des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog gsog par byed de des tshangs pa
141a5(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so/ /de nas ser sna kun du sten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des na rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhen bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi dags su
141a6(mdo sde): skyes so/ /de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gaN DI mjug med pa brdungs nas rus bu phyir phyung ngo / /de nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas phyir gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ /
141a7(mdo sde): de nas gnas khang gi sgo phye ste/ chos gos dang lhung bzed g.yar snga 'grim pa la zhugs pa dang / re shig na yi dags rkang lag dang mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs pa chos gos dang lhung bzed 'dzin
141a8(mdo sde): cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas dge slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan kyis rigs kyi bu de la phan gdags pa dang slob ma'i
141b1(mdo sde): tshogs rnams skyo ba bskyed pa dang ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te gnas der gshegs so/ /
141b2(mdo sde): de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas
141b3(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te ngo tsha bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi
141b4(mdo sde): 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dags de spyos te bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des na yi dags su skyes pa yin gyis/ da yang nga
141b5(mdo sde): la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye sta re/ de nas yi dags des chos gos dang lhung bzed dge 'dun la
141b6(mdo sde): phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dags kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi dags phyi
141b7(mdo sde): bzhin song / /yi dags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du thar gyur cig /de nas yi dags de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so/ /de nas yi dags
141b8(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi
142a1(mdo sde): mtshan mo/ lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom
142a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo / /de'i tshe dge
142a3(mdo sde): slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the tsom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
142a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
142a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ yi dags de shi nas yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas
142a6(mdo sde): ngas de la chos bstan te de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las yi dags su gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste dge slong khyed kyis de
142a7(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das
142a8(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon
142b1(mdo sde): rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang
142b2(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang gzims cha dang zhal zas dang
142b3(mdo sde): gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham
142b4(mdo sde): thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo / /rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi
142b5(mdo sde): dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nye 'khor tu yi dags mo gshin rje'i sring mo 'dra ba la/ lus khrag gis bsgos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu
142b6(mdo sde): lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig
142b7(mdo sde): byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug /yi dags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyed la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par
142b8(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog
143a1(mdo sde): las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no
143a2(mdo sde): cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dam
143a3(mdo sde): bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da bzod ga las 'ongs/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yi dags kyi nang du mchi mchi ba las slar
143a4(mdo sde): mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dags mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra ba la/ lus khrag gis bgos pa/ dur khrod na gnas pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ bdag ni nyin bzhin
143a5(mdo sde): bu lnga btsa'/ /mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste/ /btsas nas de dag zos na yang / /'grangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchi na/ /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di
143a6(mdo sde): 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu yi dags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par
143a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lags so/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mnga'
143a8(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga'
143b1(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyod do rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med de de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu
143b2(mdo sde): ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas bud med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang
143b3(mdo sde): lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu
143b4(mdo sde): phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i
143b5(mdo sde): rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/
143b6(mdo sde): pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur to/ des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu yang ma
143b7(mdo sde): byung bu mo yang ma byung nas de'i blo 'di lta bu dag skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chun ma zhig blangs na/ brgya la bu yod par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu
143b8(mdo sde): rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te
144a1(mdo sde): bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'byung bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/ /de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ /
144a2(mdo sde): bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig /mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig /gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig /nor skal
144a3(mdo sde): la spyod par shog cig / bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis
144a4(mdo sde): gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag
144a5(mdo sde): ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa
144a6(mdo sde): che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba med pa'i
144a7(mdo sde): zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa
144a8(mdo sde): gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa/ gal te 'di las bu btsas par gyur
144b1(mdo sde): na ni bdag la gnod pa byed par gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos snyam mo/ /'dod pa las yongs su bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha ltas pa des
144b2(mdo sde): yid rngon du bcug nas/ gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no/ /de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal che la bkug ste/
144b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug nas mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin te des bdag gi bu 'phyil to zhes byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna' bor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par
144b4(mdo sde): gyur na bdag yi dags mor gyur te/ bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig ces so/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dags mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des
144b5(mdo sde): na yi dags mor skyes so/ /des brdzun byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson
144b6(mdo sde): par bya ste/ ci nas yi dags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu
144b7(mdo sde): dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod
144b8(mdo sde): pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ phyi sa khung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon
145a1(mdo sde): r nams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas
145a2(mdo sde): te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims
145a3(mdo sde): cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs
145a4(mdo sde): shig gi nang na yi dags zas su skyugs pa za ba/ bor ba za ba ngar snabs dang gcin gyis 'tsho ba rnag dang khrag dang phyi sa za ba mi bzad pa rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gnas so/ /yang smras pa/ skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za/ /ngar
145a5(mdo sde): snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang / /rnag khrag dang ni phyi sa za/ /mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug /yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing
145a6(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i
145a7(mdo sde): mthu yin no zhes zer ro/ /re shig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u mdog ngan zhing lta na mi sdug la byad ngan pa lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so/ /de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi byams pa'i
145a8(mdo sde): dbang gis sbrel bas pha ma gnyis kyis gsos so/ /de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang phyi sa khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'jug nas de'i ming phyi sa khung phyi sa khung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /
145b1(mdo sde): re shig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams su dga' ba las na 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'di rab tu
145b2(mdo sde): dbyung ngo snyam mo/ /des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la legs pa byed pa la yang gnas so/ /de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dags lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi
145b3(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to/ /phyis re shig na khye'u phyi sa khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du
145b4(mdo sde): song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas/ yi dags de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus
145b5(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
145b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag phongs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cis phongs yi dags rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
145b7(mdo sde): phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/ des yi dags lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do/ /de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
145b8(mdo sde): bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas yi dags las shi
146a1(mdo sde): 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
146a2(mdo sde): bdag cag zhag lon te bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i
146a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprika la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams
146a4(mdo sde): kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom
146a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams
146a6(mdo sde): dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/
146a7(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang
146a8(mdo sde): gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas khye'u phyi sa khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang yi dags
146b1(mdo sde): ma mthong ngo / /de nas tshol ba la zhugs te de de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs
146b2(mdo sde): pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung
146b3(mdo sde): ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi la brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin
146b4(mdo sde): tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa 'gro ba lnga las yang dag
146b5(mdo sde): par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/
146b6(mdo sde): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/
146b7(mdo sde): chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod
146b8(mdo sde): pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar byas su ni
147a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las
147a2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul
147a3(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs
147a4(mdo sde): kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor te/ srang du gshegs na phyi sa khung yang phan tshun 'khor
147a5(mdo sde): 'khor te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas
