147a7(mdo sde): de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba
147a8(mdo sde): mchis te/ chud par 'gyur na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba mkhyen pas de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par
147b1(mdo sde): thugs su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni
147b2(mdo sde): bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur
147b3(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung
147b4(mdo sde): phog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brten par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig
147b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam
147b6(mdo sde): mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa
147b7(mdo sde): dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na yang ngan pa la dga' bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
147b8(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong phyi sa khung 'di ni nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag /the tsom skyes te/
148a1(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan phyi sa khung gis las ci bgyis na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
148a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyi sa khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
148a3(mdo sde): phyi sa khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
148a4(mdo sde): khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la smin par 'gyur
148a5(mdo sde): ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang
148a6(mdo sde): po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
148a7(mdo sde): gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so/ /
148a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so gtsug lag khang de na so so'i
148b1(mdo sde): skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de yang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste dge slong gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par
148b2(mdo sde): byed do/ /dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do/ /phyis re shig na ga zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra
148b3(mdo sde): bcom pa zhig 'ongs so/ /gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te phyi de nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par
148b4(mdo sde): cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so/ /dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las re shig na phyi de nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul bshos kyang bshams pa las dge slong gzhi ba de yang 'ongs te/
148b5(mdo sde): de yang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed rings su byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de phrag dog skyes nas/ des sdang
148b6(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang sla'i sbyin bdag 'di lta bu bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs pa
148b7(mdo sde): 'di las ches mi bzad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas cang mi zer bar dang du blangs so/ /re shig na tshogs par gyur te gro la bab pa na dge slong gzhi ba des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems
148b8(mdo sde): bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so/ /de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod par gsol lo zhes byas so/ /de
149a1(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ de nas de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing
149a2(mdo sde): bshags te shad kyis sbyangs so/ /'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so/ /de nas re shig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa dang des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang ngag gi
149a3(mdo sde): las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig / bdag gis klags pa dang / kha don byas pa dang sbyin pa dang sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par
149a4(mdo sde): smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi sa khung 'di nyid yin te/
149a5(mdo sde): des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe yang / 'di ltar dri nga zhing mchog
149a6(mdo sde): tu dri nga bar gyur la mi gtsang ba dang snyag snyig la dga' bar gyur to/ /des kha thon byas pa dang phung po la mkhas pa dang khams la mkhas pa dang skye mched la mkhas pa dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang gnas dang gnas
149a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang ba la
149a8(mdo sde): brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi sa khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyod kyis de
149b1(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
149b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so// // sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang / /sa la dang ni dpal ldan ma/ /gos dang ne
149b3(mdo sde): tso pho nya dang / /ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang / /ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yin/ /sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor
149b4(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
149b5(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
149b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /
149b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/
149b8(mdo sde): de yang ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do/ /de nas des
150a1(mdo sde): rang gi skyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o/ /de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig du
150a2(mdo sde): skyes so/ /de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu yang che ge mo'i bskyed mos tshal du song ba de dag thams cad
150a3(mdo sde): brlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs gyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma
150a4(mdo sde): gtogs pa de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
150a5(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyis gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /
150a6(mdo sde): yang dag par gzeng stod yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzeng stod yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung
150a7(mdo sde): bar bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
150a8(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa/ sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/
150b1(mdo sde): skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /
150b2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan
150b3(mdo sde): ' das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma
150b4(mdo sde): stong gi 'od pas lag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i
150b5(mdo sde): lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang / /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
150b6(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo
150b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems skyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/
150b8(mdo sde): bzhin bzangs dag khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par lhung bar byas so/ /da yang nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di nas shi
151a1(mdo sde): 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes re/ de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de ngus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka'
151a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar med/ /mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis/ /don med ngus pas ci la phan/ /'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas
151a3(mdo sde): spangs na legs/ /'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das gyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du bsnams so/ /de'i skabs su rgyal po dang yul ma ga d+hA'i skye bo
151a4(mdo sde): 'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa des rang gi lus la dmad de kha 'tshos nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas/ sum bcu rtsa
151a5(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /
151a6(mdo sde): de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam
151a7(mdo sde): du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i
151a8(mdo sde): lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs gyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ /lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprika la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi
151b1(mdo sde): mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me
151b2(mdo sde): t og gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
151b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
151b4(mdo sde): bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i
151b5(mdo sde): sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis
151b6(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin du mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /
151b7(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa
151b8(mdo sde): bgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar bka' ba yis/ /thub pa khyed ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'chang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud
152a1(mdo sde): cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa
152a2(mdo sde): dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams
152a3(mdo sde): cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po longs nyal te ci bya/ de nas rgyal po sad de/ 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so/ /
152a4(mdo sde): de na re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug pa btul te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar
152a5(mdo sde): gyur to/ /da bdag gis khyod la bstan gyis khyod song la bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la bdag gi phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te yon gyi rabs kyang gdon
152a6(mdo sde): par gsol cig / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so/ /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /
152a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+hA'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gter phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum
152a8(mdo sde): gyi bar du bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des
152b1(mdo sde): lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des shas cher chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed
152b2(mdo sde): pa des ni sbrul gdug par skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi
152b3(mdo sde): blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spangs ba'i phyir brtson par byas te/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i
152b4(mdo sde): yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan la
152b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
152b6(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha
152b7(mdo sde): rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang /
152b8(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha
153a1(mdo sde): dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
153a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhing pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu
153a3(mdo sde): chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na/ sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so/ /de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu
153a4(mdo sde): dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas de bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas de 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong
153a5(mdo sde): khyer thams cad du brgyud de bskor nas/ bram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dag gi tshe yang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/ /bram ze de'i
153a6(mdo sde): khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos
153a7(mdo sde): nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do/ /de yang tshe thung ste shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis/
153a8(mdo sde): sems rnams pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das las
153b1(mdo sde): sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par
153b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub dkor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can
153b3(mdo sde): lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spri ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams
153b4(mdo sde): cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam
153b5(mdo sde): pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
153b6(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi
153b7(mdo sde): m a'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas
153b8(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang mnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso/ /
154a1(mdo sde): yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis
154a2(mdo sde): de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig / shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis
154a3(mdo sde): mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal
154a4(mdo sde): nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las
154a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed
154a6(mdo sde): pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum
154a7(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi
154a8(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu bu gcig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas/ de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i
154b1(mdo sde): lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing
154b2(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang mi mthun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pang par bzhag ste kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu bo/ kyi hud bu gcig zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar 'tshogs kyang
154b3(mdo sde): bslang ma nus nas de khwa dang chun lag dang bya rgod dang wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ /bud med skra gshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go/ /de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas
154b4(mdo sde): snying rjes snying bskyod de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go/ /de nas bram ze des drang srong de la dris pa/ kye'i drang srong chen po khyod dka'
154b5(mdo sde): thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ nga ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/ nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni
154b6(mdo sde): mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la yang zhon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do/ /bram zes smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun tu dka' thub spyad byas te/ /dka' thub mchog ni spyad byas kyang / /gnas
154b7(mdo sde): de khyod kyis re mi 'thob/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mi gtsang ba'i ro shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ bram zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu gcig pa shi ste de sgrub bo/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ gal
154b8(mdo sde): te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun tu ngu ba'i las byas kyang / /bu de khyod kyis re mi thob/ /khyod ni ngus kyang ci la phan/ /de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces dris so/ /
155a1(mdo sde): de nas drang srong gis cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste/ pha la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin te bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum
155a2(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so/ /yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang / khyed kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar gyur yang srid do/ /de nas bram ze des shi ba'i
155a3(mdo sde): rus bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden
155a4(mdo sde): pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /des mtho bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed
155a5(mdo sde): pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo / /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan
155a6(mdo sde): 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che
155a7(mdo sde): ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pha gsad pa la thug pa la lan gsum skyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
155a8(mdo sde): dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu grang ba zhig go/ /de nas re shig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas/ rgyal pos gshed
155b1(mdo sde): ma rnams la sod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa
155b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no/ /byi ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na des pha dang bu gnyis ka bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das
155b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la de gnyis ka dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na
155b4(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang chos thams cad bdag med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par byas te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
155b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //sa la
155b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang
155b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang
155b8(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ /na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
156a1(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sa la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog
156a2(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas shing sa la'i me tog blangs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sa la'i me tog blangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang bcom ldan
156a3(mdo sde): 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
156a4(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun
156a5(mdo sde): nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sa la'i me tog gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo
156a6(mdo sde): snyam pa dang / re shig na de sa la'i shing la 'dzegs pa las lhung ste shi nas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes so/ /de nas re shig na lus dang gzhal med
156a7(mdo sde): khang sa la'i me tog gis brgyan te/ lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug
156a8(mdo sde): pa las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sa la'i me tog gis brgyan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci phyir khyod kyi
156b1(mdo sde): lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ /
156b2(mdo sde): las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ /lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas/ /sa la'i me tog rdul med pa/ /bzang po dag gis legs
156b3(mdo sde): par gtor/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni lhag par mngon tu mdzes/ /bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing / /nyes pa thams
156b4(mdo sde): cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad ma'i mdab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs
156b5(mdo sde): rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar
156b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur
156b7(mdo sde): par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i
156b8(mdo sde): phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma
157a1(mdo sde): la'i lo ma dang spri ka la sogs pas byugs pa de/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo sa la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid de dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /
157a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud
157a3(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/
157a4(mdo sde): des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar
157a5(mdo sde): p a'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis
157a6(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams
157a7(mdo sde): rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /
157a8(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /
157b1(mdo sde): de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa
157b2(mdo sde): dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du/ 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /
157b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
157b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
157b5(mdo sde): pa/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong
157b6(mdo sde): lags so/ /de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song
157b7(mdo sde): ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o bla mar bya'o ri mor bya'o mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes
157b8(mdo sde): dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs
158a1(mdo sde): pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon
158a2(mdo sde): rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas
158a3(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal
158a4(mdo sde): zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
158a5(mdo sde): khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams
158a6(mdo sde): med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying
158a7(mdo sde): pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/
158a8(mdo sde): shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod dang / skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas
158b1(mdo sde): te dong nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ma'i rngo mi thog na/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i
158b2(mdo sde): dbu skra dang se mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal sro bar ci gnang / 'on kyang bdag cag gis de la rgyun du mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis bkur
158b3(mdo sde): sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang se mo stsal du gsol 'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du
158b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ zhal sro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
158b5(mdo sde): pas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal sros nas/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dang
158b6(mdo sde): spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis sbad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal
158b7(mdo sde): po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bcas
158b8(mdo sde): so/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshes bcwa lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de la su yang phyag dar byed pa 'am mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dbul ba med do/ /de nas btsun mo
159a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang mthong rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang dran nas/ snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams
159a2(mdo sde): las 'gribs so zhes zer ro/ /de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsdos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ mar me'i phreng ba
159a3(mdo sde): dngar to/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / re shig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar
159a4(mdo sde): me'i phreng ba dngar ba lags so zhes byas so/ /de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces smras na/ de na re bdag gis khyod kyis bka' bcag tu lags kyang bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po
159a5(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro/ /de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /de'i
159a6(mdo sde): tshe lha mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba
159a7(mdo sde): chen po de dang lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung
159a8(mdo sde): 'di dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ /las rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ /lha mos smras pa/
159b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron gcig po/ /mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong / /smra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la/ /mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon tu phul/ /zla ba'i 'od zer mdog
159b2(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa skyes/ /'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis/ /ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni lhag par mngon tu
159b3(mdo sde): mdzes/ /zhing mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyis zhing / /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis
159b4(mdo sde): sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /
159b5(mdo sde): gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las
159b6(mdo sde): gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal
159b7(mdo sde): ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /
159b8(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad
160a1(mdo sde): 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa
160a2(mdo sde): dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po
160a3(mdo sde): nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod do/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang
160a4(mdo sde): r us pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma gyis rgyal pos kyang
160a5(mdo sde): ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma dgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por
160a6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthus yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin
160a7(mdo sde): tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar
160a8(mdo sde): dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i
160b1(mdo sde): bu mo dpal ldan ma/ tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid
160b2(mdo sde): kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom
160b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
160b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang
160b5(mdo sde): bsdos te/ sangs rgyas kyi mon tan rjes su dran nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste sum
160b6(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ deng mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /
160b7(mdo sde): bla mar bya'o/ /ri mo bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ /mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
160b8(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gos shes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams
161a1(mdo sde): d ang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang
161a2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
161a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
161a4(mdo sde): tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul de/
161a5(mdo sde): mthar gyis gser srang bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe de'i blo skyes pa ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis/ bdag gis skye bo dbul po
161a6(mdo sde): rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po
161a7(mdo sde): la yang phan gdags par gyur la/ bsod nams mang po yang bskyed par 'gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de/ rgyal po la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa
161a8(mdo sde): thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor kyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig / deng nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi
161b1(mdo sde): phyir glang po che la zhon te/ dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas re shig na zhag bdun lon pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang
161b2(mdo sde): po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni mgul gyi se mo do sbyin par byed/ kha cig
161b3(mdo sde): ni gdu bu sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser gyi phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin
161b4(mdo sde): par byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do/ /khyim bdag de yang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len par byed do/ /de nas re shig na bud med shin tu
161b5(mdo sde): dbul mo zhig gis sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas des ras de gyon te srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga zlum brdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ong pa mthong nas des dge bsnyen zhig
161b6(mdo sde): la dris pa ji ste/ khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter sa'i 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re gzhan la phan
161b7(mdo sde): gdags pa'i phyir te gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang po bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la dbul du 'jug go zhes zer ro/ /de nas
161b8(mdo sde): bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la/ bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i/ mthu bdag la med kyis/ bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya
162a1(mdo sde): gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug gcig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/ /des bsams pa gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag
162a2(mdo sde): gcer bur byung gis bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo/ /de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang
162a3(mdo sde): thog nas bor ba las na/ 'di la nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed dong la ras 'di sus bor ba ltos shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang re shig na bu mo de tsog tsog por
162a4(mdo sde): 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis dris pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa/ bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste bdag gis gos rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong
162a5(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to/ /
162a6(mdo sde): de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la yang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo / /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon
162a7(mdo sde): pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan
162a8(mdo sde): 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul do thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos rgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i
162b1(mdo sde): cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal
162b2(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras
162b3(mdo sde): 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i
162b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
162b5(mdo sde): kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag
162b6(mdo sde): la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/
162b7(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan
162b8(mdo sde): mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i
163a1(mdo sde): pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /
163a2(mdo sde): thub pa khyod kyi deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /
163a3(mdo sde): de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan
163a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen
163a5(mdo sde): po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom
163a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin
163a7(mdo sde): gyi/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos
163a8(mdo sde): bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya ba'o bkur sti med par mi bya'o zhes dge
163b1(mdo sde): slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
163b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/
163b3(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
163b4(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du
163b5(mdo sde): yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang
163b6(mdo sde): l o legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste
163b7(mdo sde): gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dag pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba
163b8(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/ /de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/
164a1(mdo sde): lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod
164a2(mdo sde): do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
164a3(mdo sde): kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig
164a4(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum
164a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang
164a6(mdo sde): dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la
164a7(mdo sde): gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ /stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur
164a8(mdo sde): grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nang dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/
164b1(mdo sde): su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas
164b2(mdo sde): ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi
164b3(mdo sde): dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las

164b5(mdo sde): rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te
164b6(mdo sde): lhung bzad bsnams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas shin
164b7(mdo sde): tu rings par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/ /bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs
164b8(mdo sde): gdab par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing gang la ne tso gnas pa de'i drung du rtswa'i gdan bting nas skyil dkrung bcas te bzhugs so/ /nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan
165a1(mdo sde): dag gi drung du 'khod do/ /de nas ne tsos bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'am gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am ri dgas sam gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nags khrod
165a2(mdo sde): de na phan tshun skor bar byed do/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom

165a5(mdo sde): 'ba' shig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas ne tso mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig /bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul
165a6(mdo sde): du gshegs lags kyis/ khyod kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang bzangs kyi steng nas babs nas/ blon po chen po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/
165a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams dang bdug pa dang spos dang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
165a8(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/ bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so/ /de nas ne tso de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag
165b1(mdo sde): gi yon tan yin no snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga'
165b2(mdo sde): ba bskyed de shi bas ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis
165b3(mdo sde): skyes snyam mo/ /de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
165b4(mdo sde): zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing
165b5(mdo sde): 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me
165b6(mdo sde): tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos nyan
165b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs
165b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden
166a1(mdo sde): pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa
166a2(mdo sde): dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang

166b4(mdo sde): yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des ne tsor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom

166b6(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams
166b7(mdo sde): dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur
166b8(mdo sde): ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang
167a1(mdo sde): po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes
167a2(mdo sde): bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re shig na dge
167a3(mdo sde): bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /des bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong
167a4(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges
167a5(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar

167a8(mdo sde): ' khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po

167b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i
167b3(mdo sde): khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar
167b4(mdo sde): gyur cig / sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar
167b5(mdo sde): 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang
167b6(mdo sde): du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam bzhes so zhes thos lags so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po
167b7(mdo sde): gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor kyi mi dang yul ba dang blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyar bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la/ der
167b8(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag tshol la/ bdag cag gi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am stobs dang ldan nam bde ba dang ldan nam mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am
168a1(mdo sde): bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag
168a2(mdo sde): cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na thugs brtse
168a3(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang blon po dang pho brang 'khor kyi mi dang
168a4(mdo sde): yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/ mthar kyis song song ba las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das
168a5(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang mnyan du yod pa na
168a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor kyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am stobs dang ldan nam bde ba dang ldan nam mi bde ba mi mnga'
168a7(mdo sde): 'am bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes mchi'o/ /'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan
168a8(mdo sde): 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal te nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar
168b1(mdo sde): bya'o/ /de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
168b2(mdo sde): kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin
168b3(mdo sde): nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas zhabs 'bring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa logs su chas te gshegs so/ /pho nya yang shing rta la zhon te chas so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis
168b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong nas shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes
168b5(mdo sde): su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang / /yang dag stsol la nga gnas nas/ /nyon mongs tsher mas ma snad par/ /sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed/ /pho nyas gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das
168b6(mdo sde): ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang / bdag la phan gdags pa dang thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcibs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du
168b7(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to/ /de nas rgyal po dang blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
168b8(mdo sde): bsu nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod to/ /pho nya de ni tshe thung ste chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes
169a1(mdo sde): so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang
169a2(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom
169a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus
169a4(mdo sde): do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang ku
169a5(mdo sde): mu da dang pad ma dang pad ma dkar po dang man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir
169a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
169a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas
169a8(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo
169b1(mdo sde): r nams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis
169b2(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /
