169b3(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brtan nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya
169b4(mdo sde): mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phangs thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad sangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng
169b5(mdo sde): mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon pho
169b6(mdo sde): n yar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
169b7(mdo sde): du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
169b8(mdo sde): ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
170a1(mdo sde): po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/ khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
170a2(mdo sde): yul bzang por skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas rgyal po de ngo mtshar du gyur nas kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos kye ma dge 'dun 'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig
170a3(mdo sde): las kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
170a4(mdo sde): stan las langs te song ngo / /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang chos mchog tu gdags pa dang
170a5(mdo sde): dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam rkang gnyis rnams sam rkang bzhi rnams sam rkang mangs rnams sam gzugs can rnams sam gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam
170a6(mdo sde): 'du shes can rnams sam 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam 'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par
170a7(mdo sde): bstan to/ /sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du/ /lhar gyur pa rnams sam mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa
170a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral
170b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos mchog yin par ston to/ /chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam mi rnams
170b2(mdo sde): kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na tshogs sam 'dus pa 'am mang po 'am 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi
170b3(mdo sde): nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan te/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin
170b4(mdo sde): pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
170b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ ma he zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
170b6(mdo sde): l dan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam
170b7(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
170b8(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
171a1(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod gcig tu byon pa las/ nags khrod de na ma he'i khyu chen po dang ma he rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do/ /de nas re shig na de'i nang na ma he stobs
171a2(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de mi gzhan dag gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so/ /de nas ma he rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
171a3(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis skad cher bos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/ shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
171a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kye ngas 'dir dus la bab par shes kyis snying ma chung shig /de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring mo zhig nas mthong ba dang rnga ma ldang du gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
171a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul te/ glo g.yas g.yon du mi chen po lnga sprul to/ /steng du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul to/ /de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen
171a6(mdo sde): po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la/ des brda
171a7(mdo sde): phrad pa'i skad du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de des thos nas
171a8(mdo sde): ngus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar yod/ /mi khom par ni skyes zin kyis/ /don med ngus pas ci la phan/ /'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /
171b1(mdo sde): nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs/ /'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la dmad de kha 'tshos nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams ni me'i drod che
171b2(mdo sde): bas de skyen par shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes
171b3(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag
171b4(mdo sde): lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/
171b5(mdo sde): lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku
171b6(mdo sde): mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas
171b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ma her
171b8(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i/ rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom
172a1(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag
172a2(mdo sde): p a 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong
172a3(mdo sde): dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das
172a4(mdo sde): pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang
172a5(mdo sde): thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur
172a6(mdo sde): te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs
172a7(mdo sde): p hyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas
172a8(mdo sde): su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdang sum
172b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyis pa de su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum
172b2(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to/ /
172b3(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas dag cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas de
172b4(mdo sde): dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa
172b5(mdo sde): thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus
172b6(mdo sde): las gang dag bgyis na/ des ma her skyes lags las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ ma he rdzi 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des ma he rdzir gyur lags/ las
172b7(mdo sde): gang bgyis pas ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/
172b8(mdo sde): dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
173a1(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyir rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge
173a2(mdo sde): ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus
173a3(mdo sde): la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
173a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
173a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang
173a6(mdo sde): gtan la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go/ /de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/ de dag sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/ des ni lan ma thebs pa dang / de khros nas ngag gi las rtsub po phyung
173a7(mdo sde): ste/ nags kyi ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas so/ /de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge
173a8(mdo sde): slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he 'di yin no/ /slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so/ /slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to/ /nga la sems dga' bar gyur
173b1(mdo sde): pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /dge slong gi dngos po thob ste tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang dgra bcom nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas
173b2(mdo sde): ma he dang ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
173b3(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po
173b4(mdo sde): r nams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci
173b5(mdo sde): rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa bya ste/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
173b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na
173b7(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de chos mnyan pa'i phyir rtag
173b8(mdo sde): tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas phyis re shig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
174a1(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
174a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
174a3(mdo sde): thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris
174a4(mdo sde): d ang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi
174a5(mdo sde): tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod
174a6(mdo sde): kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brtan nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug
174a7(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /
174a8(mdo sde): thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa
174b1(mdo sde): khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i tshe dge
174b2(mdo sde): slong dag srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson par lhur byed pa la gnas te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
174b3(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
174b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te ngas
174b5(mdo sde): de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las
174b6(mdo sde): byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs
174b7(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
174b8(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
175a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /phyis re shig na rgyal po kri ki bcom ldan 'das la
175a2(mdo sde): blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo / /de nas re shig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ba dang / de gnyis kyis rgyal po de rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /de nas de gnyis
175a3(mdo sde): rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/ de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris te/ kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na/ des ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so/ /dge
175a4(mdo sde): bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag par bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag
175a5(mdo sde): chu stod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs so/ /de na gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ de nas shi nas rgyal po kri ki'i bur skyes te/ de'i bu'i ming legs skyes shes btags nas pha shi ba'i
175a6(mdo sde): 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go/ /gcig shos kyis ni bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin cig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye tshan bab ste des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do/ /
175a7(mdo sde): de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo/ /de nas des bsnyen gnas
175a8(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la gang gis blangs te bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam mo/ /
175b1(mdo sde): yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrung bar bya'o/ /'on kyang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag
175b2(mdo sde): nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis
175b3(mdo sde): lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bstsal du gsol/ gal te ma bstsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar lha'i dbu tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal
175b4(mdo sde): po 'jigs shing skrag ste/ mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byas nas gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/ su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag
175b5(mdo sde): brgyad dang ldan pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no/ /bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas re shig na shing mkhan gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des/ rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/
175b6(mdo sde): sngon bdag gi pha rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na/ 'di phyung ste gzigs zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas
175b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring rnams kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang / de'i 'og nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun
175b8(mdo sde): gser gyi glegs bam la bris pa zhig rnyed do/ /de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bris te byin to/ /drang srong smra ba na gnas pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun
176a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so/ /klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la phyung ste lus bor nas kha 'tshos te 'dug go/ /de nas de shi ste g.yog
176a2(mdo sde): 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/
176a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ngang pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi
176a4(mdo sde): r nams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
176a5(mdo sde): sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bson
176a6(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
176a7(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi
176a8(mdo sde): mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med
176b1(mdo sde): cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid skyangs so/ /phyis re shig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / pany+tsa la'i
176b2(mdo sde): rgyal pos/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la
176b3(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du btang nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/ bcom
176b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma byin te/ de dag gis zos nas tshim zhing mgu la dbang po rtas te 'khod do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor
176b5(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste chos nyan par byed do/ /de nas de dag tshe thung ste/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes
176b6(mdo sde): nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas ngang pa las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
176b7(mdo sde): yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas bzod bcom
176b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo
177a1(mdo sde): dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad
177a2(mdo sde): ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
177a3(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta
177a4(mdo sde): bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa
177a5(mdo sde): mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar
177a6(mdo sde): p a'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag cag lha dang mi'i nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi
177a7(mdo sde): tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi
177a8(mdo sde): mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob/ /bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag cag
177b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /
177b2(mdo sde): thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /
177b3(mdo sde): de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
177b4(mdo sde): du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong bas kyang the
177b5(mdo sde): tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom
177b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs
177b7(mdo sde): pa ma yin no/ /dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ ngang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum
177b8(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de dag mdang sum nga'i thad du lhags nas de dag la ngas chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams
178a1(mdo sde): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag bgyis na des ngang par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa
178a2(mdo sde): mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
178a3(mdo sde): bsags pas na/ sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
178a4(mdo sde): par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig
178a5(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
178a6(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
178a7(mdo sde): gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /
178a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des ni ngang par skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /
178b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par
178b2(mdo sde): dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par
178b3(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
178b4(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i/ rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // sdom ni/ gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang / /byad bzang stobs
178b5(mdo sde): ldan sdu gu dang / /pad ma mig dang rnga sgra dang / /bu dang nyi ma gyad pa dan/ /gser 'od ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang
178b6(mdo sde): ' khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur lti byas bla mar
178b7(mdo sde): byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa
178b8(mdo sde): na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i
179a1(mdo sde): gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam
179a2(mdo sde): pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang
179a3(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas
179a4(mdo sde): so/ /de nas pha ma dang sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ni ga las 'ongs zhi gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so/ /de nas de btsas
179a5(mdo sde): pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming
179a6(mdo sde): gser 'od ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u gser 'od pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'bru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la btad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang
179a7(mdo sde): zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid bzhungs pa dang dad pa dang ldan la
179a8(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go/ /phyis re shig na/ de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas myos te grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go/ /
179b1(mdo sde): shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo / /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas dris pa khyod gar 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir
179b2(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o/ /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du
179b3(mdo sde): sems te/ ma la bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas de yang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu
179b4(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu
179b5(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
179b6(mdo sde): de la chos bstan nas/ des chos de thos pa dang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to/ /de nas re shig na pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
179b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos
179b8(mdo sde): po 'thob du rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od
180a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni
180a2(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de ni mgo bregs
180a3(mdo sde): lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i
180a4(mdo sde): lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig
180a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam
180a6(mdo sde): pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob
180a7(mdo sde): pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad
180a8(mdo sde): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
180b1(mdo sde): sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za
180b2(mdo sde): bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol
180b3(mdo sde): gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang
180b4(mdo sde): khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/
180b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
180b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal
180b7(mdo sde): po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me
180b8(mdo sde): bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che
181a1(mdo sde): sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /de nas re shig na khyim bdag gcig mchod
181a2(mdo sde): rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi me long zhig lhung ba des mthong nas/ des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas/ mchod rten de la btags te/ spos dang bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag
181a3(mdo sde): 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
181a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur
181a5(mdo sde): byad gzugs kyi khyad par can du gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig
181a6(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge
181a7(mdo sde): slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
181a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dri zhim zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
181b1(mdo sde): r gyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci
181b2(mdo sde): rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
181b3(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na
181b4(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
181b5(mdo sde): zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/
181b6(mdo sde): de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas
181b7(mdo sde): me tog ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de'i nye du rnams
181b8(mdo sde): na re 'di'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri byung la/ lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri byung bas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u dri zhim pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
182a1(mdo sde): dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang
182a2(mdo sde): yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la bdag dang gzhan
182a3(mdo sde): la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che la chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim zhing dpung rgyan dang mgul pa'i do shal dang gdu bus brgyan te srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan gyi dri bsung gis
182a4(mdo sde): grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/ skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas mchog tu ya mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du/ kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes zer ro/ /phyis re shig na khye'u dri zhim n+ya gro d+hA'i
182a5(mdo sde): kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang
182a6(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom
182a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud
182a8(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu
182b1(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor
182b2(mdo sde): lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom
182b3(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar
182b4(mdo sde): gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
182b5(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des
182b6(mdo sde): 'di'i kha nas ni ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
182b7(mdo sde): ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
182b8(mdo sde): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par
183a1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar
183a2(mdo sde): yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
183a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs
183a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing
183a5(mdo sde): zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po
183a6(mdo sde): che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /khyim bdag gcig
183a7(mdo sde): gis kyang de la dad pa bskyed nas/ spos dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba
183a8(mdo sde): 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
183b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des
183b2(mdo sde): na 'di lta bur dri zhim por gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges
183b3(mdo sde): par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na
183b4(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
183b5(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po
183b6(mdo sde): bcwa lnga pa/ byad bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang
183b7(mdo sde): lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang
183b8(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims
184a1(mdo sde): cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shAkya
184a2(mdo sde): phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig
184a3(mdo sde): tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i
184a4(mdo sde): kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byad dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho ba/ che bar grags pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i
184a5(mdo sde): ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di'i lus dpe med pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byad bzang zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u byad bzang pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
184a6(mdo sde): dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad gyi
184a7(mdo sde): khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge ba bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can
184a8(mdo sde): bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang tha na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag
184b1(mdo sde): kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams dang ldan zhing che bar grags so/ /phyis re shig na de shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
184b2(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong
184b3(mdo sde): ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas
184b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u byad bzang gis 'jig
184b5(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab
184b6(mdo sde): tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad bsnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par
184b7(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar
184b8(mdo sde): gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag
185a1(mdo sde): par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams the
185a2(mdo sde): tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa byad bzang gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/
185a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byad bzang nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags
185a4(mdo sde): pas na byad bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/
185a5(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /
185a6(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu
185a7(mdo sde): rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur
185a8(mdo sde): ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par
185b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis
185b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/
185b3(mdo sde): der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas pas mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so/ /phyis re shig na nyi ma gcig cig /mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi
185b4(mdo sde): 'khor sa'i nang du song nas des de la me tog rnyis pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten
185b5(mdo sde): yang phyags me tog rnyings pa yang bsal to/ /de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong nas/ dga' ba skyes te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa
185b6(mdo sde): 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
185b7(mdo sde): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ byad bzang 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag dar byas pas na byad gzugs bzang por gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe
185b8(mdo sde): 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni
186a1(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren
186a2(mdo sde): ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs
186a3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi
186a4(mdo sde): r nams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar
186a5(mdo sde): byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa
186a6(mdo sde): na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
186a7(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam
186a8(mdo sde): pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/
186b1(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed
186b2(mdo sde): de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u stobs ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i
186b3(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog
186b4(mdo sde): gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos
186b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa zhig go/ /de nas phyis re shig na/ de shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/
186b6(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das
186b7(mdo sde): la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang
186b8(mdo sde): bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
187a1(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas
187a2(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
187a3(mdo sde): spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
187a4(mdo sde): tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba / dbang po
187a5(mdo sde): dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
187a6(mdo sde): btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid
187a7(mdo sde): kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags
187a8(mdo sde): pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la
187b1(mdo sde): rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ lus can dag gi las rnams ni/
187b2(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
187b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
187b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs
187b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom
187b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten
187b7(mdo sde): gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches glu blangs gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyis yog par gyur to/ /phyir re shig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang des mchod rten gyi 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa
187b8(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi 'de gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston
188a1(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu
188a2(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
188a3(mdo sde): sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang
188a4(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las
188a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
188a6(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //sdu gu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong
188a7(mdo sde): d pon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas
188a8(mdo sde): m chod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas
188b1(mdo sde): dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor
188b2(mdo sde): mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig
188b3(mdo sde): tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ che bar
188b4(mdo sde): grags pa mthong na dga' ba zhig btsas te de btsas pa na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs
188b5(mdo sde): par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming sdu gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u sdu gu pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma
188b6(mdo sde): gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan
188b7(mdo sde): yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
188b8(mdo sde): pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa
189a1(mdo sde): rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do/ /de nas phyis re shig na khye'u sdu gu shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
189a2(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
189a3(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
189a4(mdo sde): 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u
189a5(mdo sde): sdu gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
189a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par
189a7(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam
189a8(mdo sde): pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/
189b1(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams
189b2(mdo sde): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sdu gus las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
189b3(mdo sde): sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sdu gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar
189b4(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sdu gu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i
189b5(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang
189b6(mdo sde): skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung
189b7(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
189b8(mdo sde): gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/
190a1(mdo sde): re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
190a2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod
190a3(mdo sde): la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas phyis re shig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te me tog rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig gis rgyal po la gsol
190a4(mdo sde): pa/ bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas khyim bdag de dang rgyal po dang blon
190a5(mdo sde): po dang zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog btags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma
190a6(mdo sde): sems dga' ba skyes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdu
190a7(mdo sde): gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo phal po che dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des na/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyur gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na lta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom
190a8(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa
190b1(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las
190b2(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
