190b5(mdo sde): g nod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos
190b6(mdo sde): dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
190b7(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /
190b8(mdo sde): de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa mig pad ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo
191a1(mdo sde): la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/ des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas
191a2(mdo sde): nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di mig pad ma dang 'dra bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad ma'i mig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /
191a3(mdo sde): de nas khye'u pad ma'i mig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang
191a4(mdo sde): zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa
191a5(mdo sde): bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa gtong ba la sred pa sbyin pa la dga' ba rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/
191a6(mdo sde): de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u pad ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu
191a7(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
191a8(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
191b1(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u pad ma'i
191b2(mdo sde): mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas te des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang bram ze dang bkren pa
191b3(mdo sde): dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par
191b4(mdo sde): rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra
191b5(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
191b6(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i
191b7(mdo sde): gnas su gyur to/ /de nas re shig na de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de la bltas nas ngo mtshar bar gyur to/ /de nas pad ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das
191b8(mdo sde): la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na nor bu rin po che
192a1(mdo sde): med par bya mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyis ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /
192a2(mdo sde): de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa pad ma'i mig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid
192a3(mdo sde): thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar
192a4(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa
192a5(mdo sde): rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
192a6(mdo sde): zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu
192a7(mdo sde): nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
192a8(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing
192b1(mdo sde): bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
192b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/
192b3(mdo sde): 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re shig na/ ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub
192b4(mdo sde): ste/ phyir 'ongs nas des de'i nang nas nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom
192b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags nas de'i mthus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ga'i mdog lta bur 'dug par byas so/ /me tog pad ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas
192b6(mdo sde): nas/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan
192b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad ma'i mig 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la nor bu
192b8(mdo sde): rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo / /pad ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni/ mig pad ma sngon po lta bur gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra
193a1(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par
193a2(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang
193a3(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
193a4(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang
193a5(mdo sde): p hyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang
193a6(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
193a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i
193a8(mdo sde): gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
193b1(mdo sde): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba
193b2(mdo sde): brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa/ bya ka la ping ka ltar skad snyan pa/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas bston
193b3(mdo sde): byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u rnga sgra
193b4(mdo sde): pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang
193b5(mdo sde): gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la
193b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa gtong ba la sred pa sbyin pa la dga' ba rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u rnga sgra shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun
193b7(mdo sde): dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis
193b8(mdo sde): brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ de ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
194a1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud
194a2(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
194a3(mdo sde): bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
194a4(mdo sde): rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam
194a5(mdo sde): par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam
194a6(mdo sde): pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/
194a7(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams
194a8(mdo sde): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga sgras las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags/ bcom
194b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na rnga sgra nyid
194b2(mdo sde): kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i
194b3(mdo sde): khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /
194b4(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig
194b5(mdo sde): pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med
194b6(mdo sde): pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
194b7(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/
194b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags
195a1(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re shig na khyim bdag cig gis rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang mi las rol mo bslabs te/ mchod rten de la phul
195a2(mdo sde): nas de dag mchod rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bkur sti byed do/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan
195a3(mdo sde): 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig
195a4(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams
195a5(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par
195a6(mdo sde): bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
195a7(mdo sde): bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang
195a8(mdo sde): k lu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
195b1(mdo sde): dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang
195b2(mdo sde): gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor
195b3(mdo sde): mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan
195b4(mdo sde): cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te bu btsas na sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma
195b5(mdo sde): dang khyim de na gnas pa gzhan dag dang g.yog 'khor dang nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas re shig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/
195b6(mdo sde): lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug ste 'di ci yin su la bsnyad par bya shes pa su yod snyam mo de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen
195b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus so/ /bcom ldan
195b8(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig /sha snag bu de ras bal legs par rmel ba'i nang du chug la zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig kyang dus gsum gsum du lag pas
196a1(mdo sde): brims te/ 'o mas yang dang yang du gtor cig dang de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la de dag thams cad tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas
196a2(mdo sde): mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bsams pa bdag gi bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas des de bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag bdun lon pa dang sha snag bu de rdol
196a3(mdo sde): nas bu brgya byung ste/ thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /de nas re shig na mthar kyis
196a4(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings nas cher skyes pa dang / de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gis sangs rgyas
196a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag
196a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
196a7(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags
196a8(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong
196b1(mdo sde): nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa
196b2(mdo sde): thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
196b3(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so
196b4(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag
196b5(mdo sde): the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gzhon nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spun du gyur la tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/
196b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di rnams kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
196b7(mdo sde): 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i khams
196b8(mdo sde): dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /
197a1(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa
197a2(mdo sde): gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
