197a5(mdo sde): po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod
197a6(mdo sde): pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re shig na mdza' sde bo brgya phyi rol du byung ba dang de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/
197a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu til mar spos can kyis byugs nas/ me tog dang me tog phreng dang mar me dbul ba dag gis kyang bsnyen bkur byas nas lhan cig tu
197a8(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lto gcig kho na nas 'byung bar gyur cig /tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang byad gzugs dang ldan
197b1(mdo sde): par gyur cig / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
197b2(mdo sde): de'i dus na mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshan po che 'di dag yin te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten de la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to/ /
197b3(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /
197b4(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par
197b5(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
197b6(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/
197b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma
197b8(mdo sde): yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye
198a1(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes
198a2(mdo sde): pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin
198a3(mdo sde): pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /
198a4(mdo sde): de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas
198a5(mdo sde): nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/ de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so/ /de nas pha ma dang khyim de na gnas
198a6(mdo sde): pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang nye du rnams dang ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas/ ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i
198a7(mdo sde): ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes
198a8(mdo sde): gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u nyi ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad
198b1(mdo sde): kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge
198b2(mdo sde): zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa gtong ba la sred pa sbyin pa la dga' ba rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga'
198b3(mdo sde): ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ /de nas phyis re shig na/ khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
198b4(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
198b5(mdo sde): ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
198b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu
198b7(mdo sde): 'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas/ khye'u nyi mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden
198b8(mdo sde): pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /
199a1(mdo sde): des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad
199a2(mdo sde): chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan
199a3(mdo sde): pa/ tsan+da sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
199a4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod/ snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la lkog 'phyas byed de/ de 'di ltar nor bu
199a5(mdo sde): rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/ lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las na/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to/ /
199a6(mdo sde): de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin
199a7(mdo sde): po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na med par byar mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong
199a8(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na
199b1(mdo sde): des 'di che bar grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyi sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung
199b2(mdo sde): la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
199b3(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung
199b4(mdo sde): po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras
199b5(mdo sde): bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu rtsa dgu cig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
199b6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
199b7(mdo sde): byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ /sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad
199b8(mdo sde): mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su/ /mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen
200a1(mdo sde): yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags gcig
200a2(mdo sde): yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams
200a3(mdo sde): kyis/ spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do/ /de nas re shig na mi zhig rgyal po dang rgyan pos rtses nas skugs su nor bu
200a4(mdo sde): rin po che me shel zhig thob bo/ /de nas de dad pa bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyis mchod rten gyi char khab la btags te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
200a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur
200a6(mdo sde): cig / nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na cho
200a7(mdo sde): lo la dor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che btags pa des ni 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung
200a8(mdo sde): la rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig
200b1(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong
200b2(mdo sde): dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
200b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
200b4(mdo sde): l dan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams
200b5(mdo sde): dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
200b6(mdo sde): po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
200b7(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam
200b8(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga'
201a1(mdo sde): mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas
201a2(mdo sde): te/ gang gi tshe khye'u de btsas pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgrengs ngo / /lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdungs so/ /lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po
201a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang gtor te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to/ /khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan bsgrengs so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u
201a4(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdags so zhes zer
201a5(mdo sde): ro/ /de nas khye'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang
201a6(mdo sde): mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/ de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la
201a7(mdo sde): zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go/ /de nas phyis re shig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
201a8(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/
201b1(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom
201b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ /de thos nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
201b3(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas
201b4(mdo sde): nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang
201b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar
201b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang
201b7(mdo sde): chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de yang gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i gos spyod de/ gsol ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni
201b8(mdo sde): nyung du spyod do/ /gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong spyod de/ gsol ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung du spyod do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod
202a1(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgreng nas/ 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung
202a2(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la
202a3(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni/ phyi
202a4(mdo sde): rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye
202a5(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung
202a6(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
202a7(mdo sde): bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/
202a8(mdo sde): re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
202b1(mdo sde): 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags
202b2(mdo sde): gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod
202b3(mdo sde): rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyis ba dan dag sgreng ngo / /de nas re shig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyad gcig non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas des de blangs te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i
202b4(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pas rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan
202b5(mdo sde): de mchod rten gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
202b6(mdo sde): mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gyad du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das
202b7(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong
202b8(mdo sde): dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar
203a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/
203a2(mdo sde): las gcig du nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan
203a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa rjod pa brgya pa las/ rtogs pa rjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun
203a4(mdo sde): pa rdzogs so/ / // sdom ni/ 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma/ /dkar mo zla ba ud pa la/ /mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang / /ka tsang
203a5(mdo sde): ga la bde byed ma/ /mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan/ /'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po
203a6(mdo sde): r nams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams
203a7(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
203a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa
203b1(mdo sde): na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs
203b2(mdo sde): shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing
203b3(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan kyis klubs pa nor bu rin po che mgul na thogs pa
203b4(mdo sde): zhig btsas te/ de las 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu
203b5(mdo sde): mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma
203b6(mdo sde): gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad
203b7(mdo sde): par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de
203b8(mdo sde): la slong ba su dang su 'ongs kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do/ /byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu rnams dang blon
204a1(mdo sde): po'i bu rnams dang tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar
204a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas re shig na bu mo des pha sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas/ smras pa yab ci zhig gis sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ de nas des de'i don rgyas par
204a3(mdo sde): bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mo de na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol nas mnyan du
204a4(mdo sde): yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis khyed kyis bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la
204a5(mdo sde): zhon te chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mo bris te bstod pa 'don cing srang du zhugs so/ /de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang blon po'i bu rnams
204a6(mdo sde): dang tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis byang bar bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ye bdag 'dod pa
204a7(mdo sde): rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho nar bas so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas de dag phyir log go/ /bu mo 'od bzang ma yang bcom
204a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang
204b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu
204b2(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa yang bsgrubs so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
204b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos
204b4(mdo sde): po 'thob du rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba mang po dag des 'dren par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom
204b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/ 'di mthus dbrog
204b6(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam te/ de dag gis de gzung bar byas so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis brnyags pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan
204b7(mdo sde): to/ /so so skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la
204b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ sru mar spyon mar spyon khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma nam mkha' las babs
205a1(mdo sde): nas skye bo phal po che'i gung la 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen
205a2(mdo sde): mo la gtad de des de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /de nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi
205a3(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa
205a4(mdo sde): khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas
205a5(mdo sde): sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
205a6(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'od bzang gis las
205a7(mdo sde): gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul pa nas kyang nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
205a8(mdo sde): pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid
205b1(mdo sde): kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi
205b2(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar
205b3(mdo sde): yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
205b4(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
205b5(mdo sde): ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin
205b6(mdo sde): du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/
205b7(mdo sde): rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo
205b8(mdo sde): dam pa rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te mchod rten de la phul lo/ /de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i
206a1(mdo sde): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo
206a2(mdo sde): dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des na gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams
206a3(mdo sde): cad dang ldan par gyur to/ smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /
206a4(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa
206a5(mdo sde): rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
206a6(mdo sde): de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams
206a7(mdo sde): d ang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
206a8(mdo sde): sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
206b1(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med
206b2(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang
206b3(mdo sde): nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming
206b4(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de yang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pa smras
206b5(mdo sde): pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung / /zhing gi khyad par gzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du/ /dad pas lha mi dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin/ /de nas de'i pha ma dang gzhan yang
206b6(mdo sde): khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing dngangs te mi dga' bar gyur la/ skyi bung zhes byas nas smras pa kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go des smras pa/ yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma
206b7(mdo sde): lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bu mo lags te sbyin pa dag sbyin par 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo de 'di skad mchi'o zhes bsnyad do/ /de nas khyim
206b8(mdo sde): bdag de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rabs 'don du bcug go/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo
207a1(mdo sde): de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang phangs pa dang snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /
207a2(mdo sde): re shig na de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang btung ba med pas shi'o/ /de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
207a3(mdo sde): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la rab sdug ma la nga na re 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis
207a4(mdo sde): shig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du song nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan
207a5(mdo sde): dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rab sdug mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so/ /de nas rab sdug
207a6(mdo sde): ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so/ /de nas re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shin du rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/ rab
207a7(mdo sde): sdug ma gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ /zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so/ /mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams
207a8(mdo sde): cad bdag gis sbyar gyis khyod kyis bya mi dgos so/ /rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal te yab bden pa mthong ba lags la sa'i 'og thog dag du sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/ sbyar ba
207b1(mdo sde): 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo phreng rgyud ma dang rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma
207b2(mdo sde): dang btsun mo 'khor kyi bla drang srong sbyin dang gna' mi dang ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so/ /de nas nags khung du song nas
207b3(mdo sde): der mi ma yin pa mi'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o/ /de ltar skabs phye nas kyang / des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang zhal zas dang
207b4(mdo sde): gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing
207b5(mdo sde): mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
207b6(mdo sde): byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur
207b7(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas
207b8(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams
208a1(mdo sde): nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so/ /de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan 'das dang lam du phrad nas 'o rgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol
208a2(mdo sde): to/ /de nas re shig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas dro la bab na brgyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to/ /de nas lhung bzed lag pa
208a3(mdo sde): g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu smras pa/ gal te bsod nams dag gi rnam par smin pa yod ce na/ bdag gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /
208a4(mdo sde): de nas lhas lha'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo / /de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
208a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste dge slong ma rab sdug ma yin no/ /da nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa
208a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur
208a7(mdo sde): la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab sdug ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan
208a8(mdo sde): to dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong
208b1(mdo sde): dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas
208b2(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la
208b3(mdo sde): bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
208b4(mdo sde): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA
208b5(mdo sde): ra NA sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs
208b6(mdo sde): kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te bskyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag
208b7(mdo sde): kyang khyer ro/ /de nas re shig na de'i mngag bzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gzeb khyer te jo bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las bu mo mngag gzhug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar
208b8(mdo sde): mthong nas de dga' bar gyur te blo skyes pa/ bdag la jo bos lan gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyis bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas des gsad pa dang bcing ba dang brdeg pa dang bsdos
209a1(mdo sde): nas 'bras chan gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi thad du song ba dang / re shig na tshong dpon gyis bu mo 'bras chan gyi gzeb de ga re
209a2(mdo sde): zhes dris so/ /des smras pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu
209a3(mdo sde): dga' nas smras pa bu mo khyod deng phyin cad bran mo las phyung gis song shig / khyod kyis bdag gnyid kyis log pa na mel tshe byas pa yin no zhes smras so/ /de nas des thal mo sbyar te khyim bdag la gsol pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das
209a4(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/ de jo bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/
209a5(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la lo dgu stong gi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byas te/ 'bras chan dang skyo ma dang thug pa btung ba dang rtag res 'khor dang mgron du bod pa dang mar me'i phreng ba dang chos gos sra
209a6(mdo sde): brkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems
209a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
209a8(mdo sde): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo/ mngag gzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/
209b1(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
209b2(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur
209b3(mdo sde): ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
209b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad nas bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
209b5(mdo sde): p o rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi
209b6(mdo sde): 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
209b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas
209b8(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya snar ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan
210a1(mdo sde): pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyad kyang /
210a2(mdo sde): bu yang med bu mo yang med de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bsams pa bdag gis khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang / bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa
210a3(mdo sde): thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang ltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang gnyen dang rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces
210a4(mdo sde): de la bsgo'o/ /de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pas gu lang dang chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra
210a5(mdo sde): ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos mthun pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /
210a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor
210a7(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na pha ma ni 'dod chags langs te/
210a8(mdo sde): phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems
210b1(mdo sde): can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs nas des khyim thab la sbran to/ /de nas khyim thab kyis smras pa/ bzang mo gal te bu khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs/ de ma yin te bu mo
210b2(mdo sde): zhig btsas na ni de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de gtang ngo / /de nas re shig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni
210b3(mdo sde): ma thob pa gos dkar po gyon pa mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas re shig na shAkya snar mas khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste bu mo zhig btsas so zhes thos pa dang de khros te nang du song ngo / /de nas de'i chung
210b4(mdo sde): mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo/ /de nas shAkya snar mas bu mo mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
210b5(mdo sde): byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di gos dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo dkar mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i
210b6(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang
210b7(mdo sde): ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /bu mo dkar mo ji tsam du skye ba de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste dri ma can du yang mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la yang dri mas
210b8(mdo sde): gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas de'i pha lag
211a1(mdo sde): pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas re shig na bu mo des pha sems khongs su
211a2(mdo sde): chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ smras pa yab ci zhig gis sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ de nas des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mo na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /bdag ni 'dod pa la don du gnyer ba
211a3(mdo sde): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis/ yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas re shig na des pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu
211a4(mdo sde): byung ste/ gos gang dag gyon te btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to/ /de nas des brtson pa dang sbyor ba dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du
211a5(mdo sde): byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa
211a6(mdo sde): khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo
211a7(mdo sde): nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing
211a8(mdo sde): rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na des
211b1(mdo sde): phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang gos dkar po gyon pa dang rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
211b2(mdo sde): dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dkar mo nyid kyis las byas
211b3(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams
211b4(mdo sde): dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus
211b5(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di
211b6(mdo sde): nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med
211b7(mdo sde): pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re shig na
211b8(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig 'dug pa drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
212a1(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag
212a2(mdo sde): tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstan nas des dad pa rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
212a3(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul lo/ /de nas mthar kyis pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu
212a4(mdo sde): byung ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na gos
212a5(mdo sde): dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas so/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin
212a6(mdo sde): pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /
212a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par
212a8(mdo sde): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam
212b1(mdo sde): po bcu bdun pa/ zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod
212b2(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha'
212b3(mdo sde): lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes
212b4(mdo sde): pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs
212b5(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /de yang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming gi rnam grangs dang shes gsal dang bcas pa dang yi ge'i
212b6(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba dang lnga pa ste gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig re re nas brda' sprod nus pa zhig go/ /de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do/ /de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs
212b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung
212b8(mdo sde): ste bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
213a1(mdo sde): byed de/ nye du rnams na re bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo zla ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i
213a2(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog
213a3(mdo sde): gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla ba mthar kyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang bya ba la mkhas pa dang dran pa dang ldan pa dang thos pa
213a4(mdo sde): 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas re shig na de'i pha bram ze'i khye'u rnams la sngags slob pa na des thos pa tsam gyis lobs so/ /thos nas kyang bstan bcos de dag ltag 'og sbyor zhing 'chad nus so/ /de nas de'i grags pas mnyan
213a5(mdo sde): du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to/ /mu stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag
213a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe mnyan du yod par gshegs nas/ mkhas pa rnams dang mkhas par bgrang ba de dag phal cher bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir der 'dong bar byed do/ /de nas
213a7(mdo sde): de dag mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa kye ci'i phyir de bstan bcos shes pa dag mi 'ong / 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag
213a8(mdo sde): thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so/ /de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das
213b1(mdo sde): kyi thad du song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/
213b2(mdo sde): nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
213b3(mdo sde): go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jig
213b4(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo / /de nas des brtson pa
213b5(mdo sde): dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
213b6(mdo sde): par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha'
213b7(mdo sde): dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid
213b8(mdo sde): pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
214a1(mdo sde): rnams la/ dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa/ /de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor
214a2(mdo sde): thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dge slong
214a3(mdo sde): ma la tshig re re nas chos kyi lung dbog par mi mdzad de/ gal te khyed las lan gcig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni ngas lung dbog go/ /de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur
214a4(mdo sde): te 'dug go/ /de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lan cig bka' stsal pas bdag gis
214a5(mdo sde): bzung bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dbog pa
214a6(mdo sde): mdzad nas/ lan cig bka' stsal pas dge slong ma zla bas lobs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang / thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi
214a7(mdo sde): mchog ni 'di lta ste dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis
214a8(mdo sde): shing bsags pa des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs
214b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
214b2(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
214b3(mdo sde): te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang
214b4(mdo sde): chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

214b6(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re shig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des de la
214b7(mdo sde): lung mnos te bslabs nas kha ton tu byas te phung po la mkhas pa dang khams la mkhas pa dang skye mched la mkhas pa dang rten cing 'brel par byung ba la mkhas pa dang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas so/ /
214b8(mdo sde): mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni bskyed ma nus so/ /de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /de nas dge slong ma de 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar
215a1(mdo sde): bdag gis mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa
215a2(mdo sde): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
215a3(mdo sde): pas bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di
215a4(mdo sde): yin te des smon lam btab pa des na thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /des der lung mnos te/ bslabs nas mngon du byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par
215a5(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar
215a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom
215a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ud pa la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po
215a8(mdo sde): r nams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor kyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams
215b1(mdo sde): kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po
215b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal
215b3(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang yid 'ong gnyis phrad pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der grong khyer chen po drug po thams cad nas skye bo mang po 'du'o/ /de nas re shig na lho phyogs nas/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon
215b4(mdo sde): zhig 'ongs pa de'i bu mo ud pa la zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ lang tsho dang nad med pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa zhig yod de/ de gang gi tshe ltad mo ba'i nang du
215b5(mdo sde): 'ong ba de'i tshe/ ltad mo ba thams cad kyis yid smon byed cing lta bar byed de/ gang so sor rtog pa'i shas chung ba de dag gi 'ang yid 'phrog par byed do/ /der gang gi tshe dus ston byung ba de'i tshe rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug kyang 'ong ngo / /
215b6(mdo sde): de nas bu mo ud pa las skye bo mang po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na myir gyur pa'i nang na bdag dang byad gzugs kyis mnyam pa 'am/ khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' lta yod dam/ skye bo mang pos smras pa/
215b7(mdo sde): dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod do/ /ud pa las smras pa/ ci de mi yin nam 'on te lha yin/ skye bo mang pos smras pa/ mi ni yin mod kyi/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no/ /de nas tshig de thos nas ud pa la rgyan thams cad
215b8(mdo sde): kyis klubs te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /song nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gar byed cing glu len la rol mo byed do/ /bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang bud med kyi rtags rnams dang bud med kyi
216a1(mdo sde): brda rnams dang bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do/ /der dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni des ci bya gtol med par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che
216a2(mdo sde): b a'i rnam grangs gdul ba dang ud pa la'i byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis ud pa la rgas shing 'khogs pa la mgo skya ba dang so rto zhing phyam dgu bo ltar sgur bar 'gyur
216a3(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas de ltar sprul pa'i mod la ud pa las bdag nyid mi sdug par mthong nas byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa de med par gyur to/ /dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams
216a4(mdo sde): kyang skyo bar gyur to/ /de nas ud pa la rgyags pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ci nas rnag can gyi lus
216a5(mdo sde): 'di las tshegs chung ngus yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ud pa la dang dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang
216a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas
216a7(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis
216a8(mdo sde): ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /ud pa la yang dad pa rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas
216b1(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad

216b5(mdo sde): so/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zlos gar mkhan gyi bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang lang tshos
216b6(mdo sde): rgyags pa las rga bas skyo bar mdzad nas/ gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bzhag pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang
216b7(mdo sde): bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/
216b8(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe/ bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs pa las rga bas skyo bar byas nas/ gzha' gsang gi
217a1(mdo sde): mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod de/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mug dang bcas pa skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya
217a2(mdo sde): ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na yang ngas bu mo ud pa la rga bas skyo bar byas nas/ brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de legs par
217a3(mdo sde): rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhas bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba
217a4(mdo sde): dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma bkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/

217a7(mdo sde): 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba sna mtho ba sna legs pa smin ma stug pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming

217b1(mdo sde): zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u ka shi mdzes ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad
217b2(mdo sde): kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i

217b4(mdo sde): bu dang rtsa ba dang chus 'tsho zhing ri dgas kyi g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon la me'i sbyin sreg byed do/ /phyis re shig na 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i sul zhig tu song ba dang / re shig na der mi 'am ci'i bu mo zhig gis
217b5(mdo sde): drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas chags par gyur te/ gar byed cing glu len la rol ma byed do/ /bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang bud med kyi rtags rnams dang bud med kyi brda rnams dang bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang
217b6(mdo sde): ston par byed do/ /de nas re shig na drang srong ka shi mdzes ldan gyis bu mo de la chos bshad de che zhe khyod rgas te/ khyod kyi nga ro dang po ni snyan cing mnyen la mjug ni ra ra por gyur to zhes byas so/ /de nas des chos de
217b7(mdo sde): lta bu bstan te/ de thos nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur to/ /de nas de dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
217b8(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag khyod kyi slob mar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang
218a1(mdo sde): yin pa de ni nga yin no/ /mi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni ud pa la 'di nyid yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa btsun pa ud pa las las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing
218a2(mdo sde): lta na sdug la mdzes par gyur lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ud pa la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan
