238b6(mdo sde): bu cig song la chu klung khang ldan nas chu long cig ces byas so/ /de nas dge tshul pa sna mas bum pa khyer te chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du song ngo / /de nas khrus byas te bum pa chus bkang nas nam mkha' la song ste ched
238b7(mdo sde): 'ga' ni bum pa sngon du btang la dge tshul pa sna ma phyi bzhin 'ong ngo / /ched 'ga' ni dge tshul pa sna ma sngon du 'gro la bum pa phyi bzhin 'ong ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi
238b8(mdo sde): po rnams la chos ston te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu dge tshul pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ bum pa chus bkang ste 'ong ba
239a1(mdo sde): 'di mthong ngam/ 'dod chags zhe sdang rab spangs shing / /ma rig pa dang bral nas ni/ /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni chu chun rab tu mdzes/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge
239a2(mdo sde): 'dun gyi mdun du dge tshul pa sna ma bstod cing bsngags pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sna mas las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs
239a3(mdo sde): bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung 'tshal bzhin du skyes la/ dbang po rno ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
239a4(mdo sde): slong dag sna ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na sna ma nyid kyis las byas
239a5(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
239a6(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /
239a7(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu
239a8(mdo sde): rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med
239b1(mdo sde): pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen yod na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re shig na ded dpon zhig
239b2(mdo sde): gnas pa de gzhon nu'i tshe nas rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes pa las de rab tu 'byung ma nus nas/ gang gi tshe rgas par gyur pa de'i tshe de 'gyod pa skyes te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu ma byung ba ni bdag
239b3(mdo sde): gis ma legs pa byas so snyam mo/ /de nas des dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la sna ma'i me tog btags so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang bshos
239b4(mdo sde): gsol te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
239b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /gang gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba der gzhon nu'i tshe nas 'phags pa'i chos
239b6(mdo sde): rnams rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
239b7(mdo sde): sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa
239b8(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams
240a1(mdo sde): spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de
240a2(mdo sde): dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //lag na gser thogs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
240a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor kyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi
240a4(mdo sde): 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci rnams
240a5(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
240a6(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug
240a7(mdo sde): cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de la bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas de lag pa la rkom
240a8(mdo sde): tshugs bcas te bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med/ bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur snyam nas sems
240b1(mdo sde): khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/ /'jig rten na yang gsol
240b2(mdo sde): ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re
240b3(mdo sde): re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla
240b4(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris gzhan
240b5(mdo sde): zhig nas shi 'phos nas de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/ /bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags pa yang shes la ma chags pa yang
240b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang / bu chags pa yang shes pa dang gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang / khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs
240b7(mdo sde): su rten cing gnas so/ /gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su rten cing gnas so/ /de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te/ bdag gi rum g.yas logs
240b8(mdo sde): na brten cing gnas pa las na khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/ /de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg /lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun rin po nas smon smon
241a1(mdo sde): pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gi bu rung bar shog shig /mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig /gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig /nor
241a2(mdo sde): skal la spyod par shog shig / bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig /bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de
241a3(mdo sde): gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag
241a4(mdo sde): ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa
241a5(mdo sde): che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/ kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / ska ba
241a6(mdo sde): med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing do shal dang / se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi
241a7(mdo sde): la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/ /de nas zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag
241a8(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas de'i lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung ste/ gang gi tshe de byung ba de'i tshe yang gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
241b1(mdo sde): de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas ma thag tu lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse gnyis
241b2(mdo sde): byung bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming lag na gser thogs shes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma
241b3(mdo sde): gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings
241b4(mdo sde): te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can zhig ste/ gang gi tshe srang du 'gro ba de'i tshe dge
241b5(mdo sde): sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams mthong na lag pa gnyis brkyang nas de la gser dngul gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa'i phung po de dag la ji tsam dgos pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i
241b6(mdo sde): grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas phyis re shig na khye'u lag na gser thogs rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
241b7(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu
241b8(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
242a1(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ slob dpon bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
242a2(mdo sde): bshos gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras pa/ bu kar Sha pa Na dgos so/ /de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'greng ste lag
242a3(mdo sde): pa gnyis brkyang nas gser dngul gyi phung po chen po spungs so/ /de nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / dge slong gzhan dag dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bos de mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /
242a4(mdo sde): de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
242a5(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis 'jig
242a6(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas des nye du rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byas te/ dge sbyong
242a7(mdo sde): dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol
242a8(mdo sde): mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par mthor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon
242b1(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du
242b2(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /
242b3(mdo sde): chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod
242b4(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lag na gser thogs kyis las gang dag bgyis na des 'di sug pa gnyis las gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung la/ rab tu byung nas dgra
242b5(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag na gser thogs nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal

242b8(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal
243a1(mdo sde): pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo

243a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ rgyal po kri kis de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs to/
243a5(mdo sde): /mchod rten

243b4(mdo sde): gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ sde snod gsum pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho

243b8(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i
244a1(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang
244a2(mdo sde): nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba
244a3(mdo sde): bzhin du rgyal srid brkyangs so/ /de nas re shig na de btsun mo dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod pa las btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu
244a4(mdo sde): lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gos su chos gos tshon can gyon la dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas skyes ma thag tu dris pa/ ci mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na na bcom ldan 'das dang / shA ri'i
244a5(mdo sde): bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams bzhugs sam zhes zer ro/ /de nas de'i ma ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas nas smras pa/ bu mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na na
244a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams bzhugs so zhes byas so/ /de nas re shig na don de rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol te khyod kyi sras gos su chos gos tshon can 'tshal ba dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs
244a7(mdo sde): dran pa zhig btsas te/ de bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams ga la bzhugs pa yang rmed do zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu de la phan gdags pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
244a8(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bkad sa ga la ba der
244b1(mdo sde): gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu pang par blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brims nas/ bcom ldan 'das
244b2(mdo sde): bdag gi bu 'di btsas ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams dran lags so zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu de la sde snod gsum pa khyod nad med par gyur cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas des
244b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe btsas nas lo bdun lon pa de'i
244b4(mdo sde): tshe chos gos tshon can de dag nyid gyon bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig
244b5(mdo sde): nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te
244b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig
244b7(mdo sde): pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
244b8(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sde snod gsum pas las gang
245a1(mdo sde): dag bgyis na des chos gos tshon can 'tshal ba dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran bzhin du btsas te/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das
245a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
245a3(mdo sde): sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu
245a4(mdo sde): 'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la
245a5(mdo sde): rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal
245a6(mdo sde): pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha
245a7(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten tu byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po kri ki bu drang srong
245a8(mdo sde): smra bar song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa
245b1(mdo sde): nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i
245b2(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu bstan
245b3(mdo sde): te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po la gsol te/ yab bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na gnang
245b4(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ring po mi thogs par rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur dgos pas 'di ni ngas bcos su med do/ /bus smras pa/ rgyal srid nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa chos
245b5(mdo sde): kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag la mi 'tshal gyis/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu mi 'byung du mi gnang ngo / /de nas yab kyis ma gnang nas des zhag gcig dang gnyis dang / gsum nas zhag drug gi bar
245b6(mdo sde): du kha 'tshos so/ /de nas de'i zla grogs rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol te/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ sras 'di ni rab tu byung na legs kyi de'u re 'dir 'gum na ma legs so/ /de nas rgyal pos gnang
245b7(mdo sde): nas dam 'char bcug ste/ nam khyod sde snod gsum ma lobs kyi bar du nga dang phrad du ma 'ong cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas re shig na de yab kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste
245b8(mdo sde): des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs te/ rigs pa dang grol bar smra bar chos ston par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sngon dam
246a1(mdo sde): bcas pa gnyer dgum gor ma chag snyam nas de yab kyi thad du song ste phrad nas dris pa/ bu cung zad lobs pa lta yod dam/ des smras pa/ sde snod gsum lobs lags so/ /de nas
246a2(mdo sde): yab la chos de lta bu bstan te de thos nas rgyal po mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te smras pa/ bu cig khyod la ci dgos/ des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
246a3(mdo sde): spyan drangs la yo byad drug dbul bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang ni rgya ches ci dga' ba gyis shig /de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang
246a4(mdo sde): bcas te zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas dge slong re re la yang yo byad drug drug phul lo/ /de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag da ltar dka' bas rab tu byung ba thob nas de bzhin
246a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gos su
246a6(mdo sde): chos gos tshon can gyon la dge sbyong gi cha lugs 'di dang ldan te tshe rabs dran par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
246a7(mdo sde): na rgyal po kri ki'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sde snod gsum pa 'di yin te/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / tshe rabs dran par gyur to/ /
246a8(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig
246b1(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las
246b2(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis
246b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /grags bshes shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang
246b4(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
246b5(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
246b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
246b7(mdo sde): bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su
246b8(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur
247a1(mdo sde): spyod do/ /de'i tshe mu ge mi zad par gnod pa byung ste slong bas kyang zas mi rnyed do/ /ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang char mi 'bab par bstan pa las re shig na ded dpon de'i chung ma la bu chags
247a2(mdo sde): nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas gang gi nyin par khye'u de btsas pa de'i nyin par
247a3(mdo sde): nas than pa med par gyur to/ /de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa mtha' dag tu rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du
247a4(mdo sde): rnams na re 'di'i grags pa kun du rgyas pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming grags bshes shes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u grags bshes pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
247a5(mdo sde): dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byed kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog
247a6(mdo sde): gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe khye'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du don zhig la song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
247a7(mdo sde): 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po
247a8(mdo sde): che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
247b1(mdo sde): go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te pha ma la gsol nas/
247b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung
247b3(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
247b4(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang /
247b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra
247b6(mdo sde): ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de'i mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des na de la skom pa'i gnod pa med de/ gang gi tshe tsha ba'i dus su dge slong skom pa rnams gung skyems la dge 'dun
247b7(mdo sde): gyi nang du 'du ba de'i tshe yang de mi 'ong ngo / /de nas de dang bshes pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod la skom pa'i gnod pa med ces byas so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi mche ba gnyis las chu yan
247b8(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des na bdag la skom pa'i gnod pa med do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa grags
248a1(mdo sde): bshes 'dis las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mche ba gnyis las chab yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom
248a2(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag grags bshes nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du
248a3(mdo sde): 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ grags bshes nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
248a4(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi
248a5(mdo sde): dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /
248a6(mdo sde): tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
248a7(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba
248a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig dge slong rgan po zhig la rab tu byung ba las/ de yang le lo can
248b1(mdo sde): zhig ste gzhan la bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do/ /de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas brtan de nyid kyis bsnyen bkur byed par bskos pa dang de bdag ni bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no snyam du cher
248b2(mdo sde): 'dzin te/ dge slong ches rgan pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur len par byed nas/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad de phyis re shig na nad kyis btab pa dang / gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du sman mar blud
248b3(mdo sde): nas de mtshan mo skom ste ci bya gtol med nas chu btung snyam ste bdag gi chu snod kyi drung du song na chu med par mthong ngo / /de bzhin du mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dge 'dun gyi drung tshang du song na de dag kyang chu med par
248b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /de nas re shig na chu klung zlog byed kyi 'gram du song na de yang chu med par gyur te/ de mi dga' bar gyur nas bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang / dad pas byin pa lci bar
248b5(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir chu klung zlog byed kyi pha rol na shing zhig yod pa la 'dzegs te/ ras shig der btags nas rang gi las rnams las bsams te las la rten cing 'dug go/ /de nas re shig na phyi de nyin par nam nangs
248b6(mdo sde): pa dang gtam de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do/ /de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te phan tshun du bsnyad do/ /de nas de'i mkhan pos chu byin
248b7(mdo sde): na de yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas de mi dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis 'gan De rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas khang skyong gis 'gan De brdungs pa dang
248b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus so/ /grong khyer bA rA Na sI thog thag tu yang gtam de grags te sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so/ /de nas re shig na de'i mkhan pos gral dpon
249a1(mdo sde): gyi mdun du 'dug tu bcug nas ril ba spyi lugs chus bkang ste byin nas/ bu chu 'di dge 'dun la brims shig ces byas so/ /de nas 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba des skyo bar gyur pa de
249a2(mdo sde): nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la dad pa bskyed nas bsam pa drag pos chu de dge 'dun la brims so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas
249a3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag gis chu de bzhes te/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na 'on kyang zad par ma gyur to/ /dge 'dun thams cad la brims na yang zad par ma gyur
249a4(mdo sde): to/ /de nas lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul ya mtshan can de mthong nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de'i rgyud la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams khong du chud par gyur to/ /
249a5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chus mi brel bar byas te/ lo khri nyis stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu brims so/ /de nas phyis re shig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab
249a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshe smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod
249a7(mdo sde): s kye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur
249a8(mdo sde): cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /bdag gi mche ba'i srag nas kyang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
249b1(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags bshes 'di yin te/ des lo khri nyis stong gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brims te smon lam btab pa des na tshe 'di la mche ba'i srag
249b2(mdo sde): nas chu 'byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /
249b3(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las
249b4(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom
249b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
249b6(mdo sde): po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
249b7(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
249b8(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang /
250a1(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs
250a2(mdo sde): 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po de lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku skrun pa'i yum dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang chos ston to/ /de'i
250a3(mdo sde): tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan
250a4(mdo sde): pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal
250a5(mdo sde): gyi bu chen pos chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan
250a6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
250a7(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar
250a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa chung zad gsan tam/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ kye bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing
250b1(mdo sde): gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku skrun pa'i yum dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang
250b2(mdo sde): chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas stan las
250b3(mdo sde): langs te dong ngo / /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag
250b4(mdo sde): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag
250b5(mdo sde): par dga' bar byed do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /de
250b6(mdo sde): nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po
250b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ma mthong nas ring mo zhig lags te/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan
250b8(mdo sde): 'das mthong bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ gal te btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan
251a1(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas zhabs la phyag bzhes te gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba
251a2(mdo sde): dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la 'di skad ces gsungs shig /btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'khor bzhi po rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar
251a3(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ 'di skad du btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum
251a4(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur
251a5(mdo sde): b gyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes
251a6(mdo sde): mol du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bar khas
251a7(mdo sde): blangs par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams dong nas ring po ma
251a8(mdo sde): lon par rig nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na dper na mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mnyan du yod pa nas
251b1(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu 'dug pa der son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
251b2(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor
251b3(mdo sde): brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'dzum dmul te bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis gang ba bzhin du 'di na yang 'khor
251b4(mdo sde): mang po dang bzhugs so snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo+od gal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
251b5(mdo sde): to/ /maud gal gyi bu 'di dag la ni rang dbang med de/ gang gi tshe ngas deng shig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe ngas shog shig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'ong bar
251b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sems kyis nga'i bsam pa shes nas 'ong ba dang 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
251b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad la
251b8(mdo sde): bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod lags so/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral
252a1(mdo sde): nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang mchis so/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so/ /de nas
252a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par dgongs te tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin
252a3(mdo sde): te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags
252a4(mdo sde): pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi
252a5(mdo sde): bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs
252a6(mdo sde): 'dus shing 'khod do/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la
252a7(mdo sde): shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang
252a8(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i
252b1(mdo sde): 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la
252b2(mdo sde): shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /de nas lha kha cig stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
252b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes lags so/ /lha gzhan dag gcig gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
252b4(mdo sde): pa bdag cag ni chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes lags so/ /de nas der lha brgya phrag du ma dang / lha stong phrag du ma dang / lha 'bum brag
252b5(mdo sde): du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha rnams dong bar rig nas bla gos phrag pa gcig
252b6(mdo sde): tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
252b7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang
252b8(mdo sde): mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod dang 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig mo+od gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling
253a1(mdo sde): na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba
253a2(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom
253a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
253a4(mdo sde): yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu 'o na khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni
253a5(mdo sde): da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum ba ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes sbron cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal
253a6(mdo sde): gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa
253a7(mdo sde): las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las brkum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas mi snang bar gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling du son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
253a8(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbran pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
253b1(mdo sde): lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum ba ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
253b2(mdo sde): lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi mdab/ a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum ba ra'i drung du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe srogs chags
253b3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dus so/ /de nas der dge slong rdzus te skyes pa zhig byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
253b4(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag bshos la spyan drangs nas/ re shig na gdugs tshod la bab pa dang sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i gdan dar yug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang /
253b5(mdo sde): lha'i zhal zas bza' ba dang bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lha'i zhal zas kyis tshim par byas te/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
253b6(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag la yang bkur sti legs par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de lta bu'i chos bstan
253b7(mdo sde): pa mdzad de/ de thos nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par
253b8(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
254a1(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa
254a2(mdo sde): rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par
254a3(mdo sde): smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na des rdzus te skyes par gyur
254a4(mdo sde): la/ 'dis sems bskyed pa'i mod la ci bsams pa dang / ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs
254a5(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag
254a6(mdo sde): gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
254a7(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus
254a8(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la skye dgu'i
254b1(mdo sde): tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba
254b2(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re shig na grong med pa dgon
254b3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas shig na dge slong lnga dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis dge slong bzhi'i zhal ta byas nas/ de dag gis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad
254b4(mdo sde): spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong cig shos kyis ni de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar 'di rnams kyis bdag las brten te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
254b5(mdo sde): sum du byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag rab tu byung ste yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis brel bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam
254b6(mdo sde): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na des rdzus te skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das
254b7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang
254b8(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
255a1(mdo sde): byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra Na si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa de'i chung ma bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te nyam thag pa'i skad
255a2(mdo sde): 'byin cing ngu ba dang / des de'i sgra thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur te/ mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag
255a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung la/ ci nas bdag gis nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam gdab gor ma chag snyam ste/ de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan
255a4(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas des smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye bar gyur cig /nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams
255a5(mdo sde): su myong bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin te/ smon lam
255a6(mdo sde): btab pa des na rdzus te skyes par gyur to/ /des der dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
255a7(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin
255a8(mdo sde): pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/
255b1(mdo sde): dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mdzes pa zhes
255b2(mdo sde): bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
255b3(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
255b4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal
255b5(mdo sde): zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
255b6(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa
255b7(mdo sde): las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung
255b8(mdo sde): ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas nas/ de btsas pa'i tshe shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis
256a1(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thog thag mdzes par byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas
256a2(mdo sde): pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas mdzes par byas pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming mdzes pa zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u mdzes pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma
256a3(mdo sde): gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad
256a4(mdo sde): par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas
256a5(mdo sde): des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od mdom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
256a6(mdo sde): bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /de dga' ba skyes nas bcom
256a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang
256a8(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u mdzes pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
256b1(mdo sde): bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang /
256b2(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
256b3(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/
256b4(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang /
256b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
256b6(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
256b7(mdo sde): btsun pa mdzes pas las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing / lta na sdug la mdzes te/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob par gyur la/ 'di btsas pa'i
256b8(mdo sde): tshe yang shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kun tu mdzes par bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdzes
257a1(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ mdzes pa nyid
257a2(mdo sde): kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
257a3(mdo sde): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams

257a7(mdo sde): byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po mdzes pas de'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs so/ /de nas re shig na de'i dus ston zhig byung ba'i
257a8(mdo sde): tshe mdza' sde dag cig mchod rten gyi drung du dong ba las/ de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas dad pa skyes te me tog btags so/ /de dag gi nang nas mdza' sde bo gcig na re bdag la ni ci yang med kyis/ bdag ni
257b1(mdo sde): cang mi byed do zhes zer nas de mdza' sde de dag gi nang nas phyir byung ba las de 'gyod pa skyes te/ des me tog rnam pa sna tshogs btus nas mchod rten de nyid la me tog phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

257b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas dad pa skyes te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bsod snyoms kyang phul gos kyang phul lo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur

257b6(mdo sde): mchod rten de'i 'khor sa na rtswa dag kyang skyes so/ /de nas de dad pa skyes nas des rtswa rnams kyang phyung ste phyags ma thogs nas mchod rten dang mchod rten gyi 'khor sa phyags so/ /de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal

258b8(mdo sde): pa de kho na'i nyin par blon po khri brgyad stong gi bu yang btsas te/ thams cad kyang tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /de dag gi ming yang so so'i rkyen rkyen du 'tsham par btags so/ /de nas re shig
259a1(mdo sde): na rgyal po rtog ldan shi nas de'i 'og tu bu ka pi na rgyal por bcug go/ /blon po'i bu khri brgyad stong po de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po'i blon por bskos so/ /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po ka pi na
259a2(mdo sde): chen po blon po khri brgyad stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te ri dgas shor du song ba dang des mdun logs dang rgyab logs su dpung chen po thams cad bltas nas blon po rnams la dris pa/ kwa'e da ltar nga'i dpung
259a3(mdo sde): chen po 'di lta bu dag gzhan su la yod ces byas so/ /de nas blon po snyan par smra ba rnams kyis lha su la yang ma mchis so zhes byas so/ /de nas yul dbus nas tshong pa dag cig lho phyogs su song ba
259a4(mdo sde): de dag gis rgyal po ka pi na chen po la skyes phul lo/ /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ kye tshong pa dag yul de'i rgyal po su yin/ tshong pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha yul kha cig na ni mang po tshogs pa dbang
259a5(mdo sde): bgyid do/ /yul kha cig na ni rgyal po dbang bgyid do/ /de nas re shig na rgyal po ka pi na chen pos mnyan du yod pa la sogs pa grong khyer chen po drug tu pho nya btang ste/ gal te khyod 'greng ba la bab pa na yang ma 'dug
